en.X: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
en.Y: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon à lair pataud est capable dattaquer à la vitesse de léclair pour mordre sa proie.
fr.Y: Quand il mord avec sa puissante mâchoire, il secoue sa tête pour déchiqueter sa pauvre victime.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Frisk
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
en.Y: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

fr.X: Sil fait le guet, il prévient les autres dun danger en criant et en frappant le sol de sa queue.
fr.Y: Il se tient dressé sur sa queue pour voir les ennemis arriver de loin. À ce moment, il avertit ses amis.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Frisk
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
en.Y: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.

fr.X: La femelle senroule autour des petits pour les bercer. Il accule lennemi grâce à sa vitesse.
fr.Y: Il fabrique un nid qui convient à son corps très fin, et où lui seul peut entrer.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Tinted Lens
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

en.X: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.
en.Y: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

fr.X: Il a un sens du timing parfait. Il reste toujours en rythme en balançant sa tête.
fr.Y: Il se tient toujours sur un pied. Il change de pied si vite quon peut à peine distinguer ce mouvement.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Tinted Lens
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

en.X: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
en.Y: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

fr.X: Ses yeux sont adaptés à la nuit. Ils peuvent concentrer la faible lumière dans lobscurité.
fr.Y: Quand il réfléchit, il tourne sa tête sur 180° pour optimiser son mode de pensée.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
en.Y: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

fr.X: Quand le temps se rafraîchit, de nombreux Coxy se réunissent pour conserver un maximum de chaleur.
fr.Y: Il est timide et reste près de ses semblables. Il a un sens du toucher très développé.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Iron Fist
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

en.X: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
en.Y: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

fr.X: Quand les étoiles brillent dans le ciel, il volette partout en semant derrière lui une poudre brillante.
fr.Y: Les points sur son dos deviennent plus grands ou plus petits selon le nombre détoiles dans le ciel.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sniper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

en.X: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
en.Y: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

fr.X: Il tisse une toile en utilisant un fil fin mais solide, puis il attend tranquillement sa proie.
fr.Y: Il reste immobile dans sa toile pendant des jours. Il attend que sa proie se rapproche pour la capturer.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sniper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

en.X: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It’s hard to tell which end is which.
en.Y: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

fr.X: Il peut produire des fils de soie par larrière-train ou par la bouche. Il est difficile de différencier les deux.
fr.Y: Il attache un fil à sa proie avant de la libérer. Il sen servira pour la retrouver, elle et ses amis.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
en.Y: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

fr.X: Il vole en silence dans lobscurité à laide de ses quatre ailes. On ne lentend pas, même sil est très proche.
fr.Y: Ses quatre ailes lui permettent de voler furtivement pour approcher ses proies sans les effrayer.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
en.Y: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

fr.X: Au plus profond de locéan, son seul moyen de communication est sa lumière qui clignote constamment.
fr.Y: Il émet avec ses antennes des impulsions positives et négatives qui peuvent électrocuter ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: Lanturn’s light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star.”
en.Y: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light. With the prey incapacitated, the Pokémon swallows it in a single gulp.

fr.X: La lumière de Lanturn surgit des profondeurs. On le surnomme «étoile des profondeurs».
fr.Y: Il aveugle sa proie avec une lumière intense, puis lavale dun seul trait une fois immobilisée.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.name: Lightning Rod
hiddenAbilities.desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

en.X: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
en.Y: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

fr.X: Il prouve son courage en touchant la queue électrifiée de ses pairs.
fr.Y: Il ne sait pas encore stocker lélectricité. Il envoie des décharges par jeu ou par peur.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

hiddenAbilities.name: Friend Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

en.X: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
en.Y: Many appear when the night skies are filled with shooting stars. They disappear with sunrise.

fr.X: Il ressemble un peu à une étoile. On suppose quil est venu sur terre accroché à une météorite.
fr.Y: On en voit beaucoup lorsque le ciel se remplit détoiles filantes. Ils séclipsent au lever du soleil.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.desc: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

hiddenAbilities.name: Friend Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

en.X: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
en.Y: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

fr.X: Plutôt que de se déplacer avec ses petites pattes, il rebondit avec son corps doux et moelleux.
fr.Y: Son corps est très doux. Quand il commence à rebondir, il est impossible de larrêter.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

hiddenAbilities.name: Super Luck
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

en.X: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
en.Y: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.

fr.X: Sa coquille est remplie de joie. On dit que sil est bien traité, il porte chance.
fr.Y: Un proverbe nous enseigne que le bonheur touchera celui qui peut faire tenir debout un Togepi endormi.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

hiddenAbilities.name: Super Luck
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

en.X: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
en.Y: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

fr.X: Il se démoralise vite sil nest pas avec des gens sympathiques. Il peut léviter sans battre des ailes.
fr.Y: On dit quil napparaît quaux curs purs et quil leur apporte la joie et le bonheur.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magic Bounce
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reflects status- changing moves.

en.X: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
en.Y: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.

fr.X: Ses ailes ne sont pas assez développées et il ne peut que planer péniblement. Il fixe toujours quelque chose.
fr.Y: Il cherche sa nourriture par terre, mais quelquefois il grimpe aux arbres pour manger.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magic Bounce
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reflects status- changing moves.

en.X: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
en.Y: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

fr.X: Il peut rester à méditer sans bouger, du lever du soleil jusquà la tombée de la nuit.
fr.Y: On dit quil est calme et tranquille car il peut voir en permanence le passé et le futur.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.name: Plus
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

en.X: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
en.Y: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

fr.X: Sa laine fournie enfle lorsquil accumule de lélectricité statique. Son contact peut choquer.
fr.Y: Il garde une grande quantité dair dans sa toison pour ne pas subir les variations de température.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.name: Plus
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

en.X: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.
en.Y: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.

fr.X: Sa douce laine stocke facilement lélectricité. Sa peau caoutchouteuse prévient lélectrocution.
fr.Y: Sa queue sallume lorsque sa laine se charge délectricité. Il projette des poils électrifiés.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

fr.X: Le bout de sa queue brille si fort quil peut être vu de très loin. Il sert de balise aux gens.
fr.Y: Le bout de sa queue brille si fort quil peut être vu de très loin. Il sert de balise aux gens.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

hiddenAbilities.name: Healer
hiddenAbilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

en.X: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
en.Y: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

fr.X: Les Joliflor se réunissent souvent pour danser. On pense que cest un rituel pour appeler le soleil.
fr.Y: À la fin de la saison des pluies, il sort danser en plein air, attiré par la chaleur du soleil.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.
en.Y: The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter than water, so it acts as a float.

fr.X: Sa fourrure est imperméable, si bien quil reste sec même en jouant dans leau.
fr.Y: Le bout de sa queue renferme une huile plus légère que leau qui fait office de flotteur.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.
en.Y: The bubble-like pattern on its stomach helps it camouflage itself when it’s in the water.

fr.X: Ses longues oreilles font un radar efficace. Elles décèlent les mouvements dans le lit des rivières.
fr.Y: Les motifs sur son ventre lui permettent de se camoufler lorsquil est dans leau.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
en.Y: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

fr.X: Il fait semblant dêtre un arbre. Sa composition est en fait plus proche de la pierre.
fr.Y: Il se déguise en arbre pour éviter les problèmes. Il déteste leau et se cache par temps de pluie.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Drizzle
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

en.X: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
en.Y: If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.

fr.X: Quand trois ou plus se réunissent, ils chantent dune même voix ressemblant à un beuglement.
fr.Y: Si Ptitard et Têtarte entendent son cri, ils se rassemblent pour venir le rencontrer.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.
en.Y: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.

fr.X: Son corps est si léger quil doit sagripper au sol pour éviter de senvoler les jours de brise.
fr.Y: Il dérive avec le vent. Sa présence en nombre dans les champs et les montagnes annonce le printemps.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
en.Y: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.

fr.X: Le bourgeon sur sa tête souvre et se ferme en fonction des fluctuations de la température ambiante.
fr.Y: Il étend ses pétales pour absorber la lumière du soleil. Il flotte pour se rapprocher du soleil.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
en.Y: Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.

fr.X: Poussé par les vents saisonniers, il fait le tour du globe en semant des spores de coton.
fr.Y: Même sous un vent très violent, il contrôle sa destination en bougeant ses appendices.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Skill Link
hiddenAbilities.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

en.X: It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.
en.Y: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

fr.X: Il vit sur les plus hautes cimes. Sautant de branche en branche, sa queue lui assure un bon équilibre.
fr.Y: Sa queue est si forte quil peut lutiliser pour se suspendre aux branches des arbres.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

hiddenAbilities.name: Early Bird
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

en.X: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.
en.Y: It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.

fr.X: Il tombe du ciel soudainement. Sil est attaqué par un Piafabec, il secoue violemment ses feuilles.
fr.Y: Il vit en buvant la rosée sur les feuilles. On dit quil ne peut rien avaler dautre.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

hiddenAbilities.name: Early Bird
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

en.X: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this Pokémon’s face become more vivid and lively.
en.Y: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.

fr.X: À lapproche des beaux jours, les pétales entourant sa tête deviennent plus chatoyants.
fr.Y: Les rayons du soleil lui donnent de lénergie. Il est connu pour migrer vers les régions ensoleillées.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.desc: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

hiddenAbilities.name: Frisk
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.
en.Y: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.

fr.X: Il voit à 360° sans avoir à tourner la tête. Il ne loupe jamais une proie, même dans son dos.
fr.Y: En battant des ailes très vite, il peut générer une violente onde de choc qui peut briser les fenêtres.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unaware
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

en.X: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
en.Y: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon vit en eaux froides. Il ne les quitte que pour se nourrir quand il fait froid à lextérieur.
fr.Y: Il émerge de leau lorsque lair se rafraîchit pour partir chasser sur les berges.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unaware
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

en.X: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
en.Y: This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

fr.X: Cest un grand paresseux qui attend au fond de la rivière quune proie lui tombe dans le bec.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon est très insouciant. Quand il nage, il fonce tête la première dans la coque des bateaux.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magic Bounce
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reflects status- changing moves.

en.X: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.
en.Y: Its fur is so sensitive, it can feel minute shifts in the air and predict the weather...and its foes’ thoughts.

fr.X: Le bout fourchu de sa queue frémit lorsquil prédit la prochaine attaque de son adversaire.
fr.Y: Sa fourrure ultrasensible détecte les vibrations de lair. Il peut ainsi prédire le temps ou lire les pensées adverses.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

hiddenAbilities.name: Inner Focus
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

en.X: The light of the moon changed Eevee’s genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.
en.Y: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it’s filled with a mysterious power.

fr.X: La lumière de la lune a modifié le code génétique dÉvoli. Il hante les ombres en quête dune proie.
fr.Y: Quand il sexpose à la lumière de la lune, ses anneaux brillent et il développe de mystérieux pouvoirs.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another’s stashes.
en.Y: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

fr.X: Il vole tous les objets brillants quil voit. Les Cornèbre et les Miaouss se volent mutuellement.
fr.Y: Craint et peu aimé, il paraît quil porte malheur à ceux qui croisent son chemin la nuit.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
en.Y: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

fr.X: Dune grande intelligence, il sait rester calme, même en situation stressante.
fr.Y: Une fois sa tête mordue, des toxines ont envahi Ramoloss et lui ont conféré des pouvoirs immenses.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.
en.Y: It likes playing mischievous tricks, such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

fr.X: Il se nourrit de la peur absorbée par ses orbes rouges. Il somnole à lombre en journée.
fr.Y: Il pousse des hurlements la nuit pour effrayer les gens.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
en.Y: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.

fr.X: Son corps plat et fin est toujours collé aux murs. On pense que sa forme a une signification.
fr.Y: Il rappelle une écriture ancienne. Reste à savoir qui du langage ou de Zarbi est apparu en premier.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
en.Y: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

fr.X: Il déteste la lumière et les chocs. Sil est attaqué, il se gonflera pour riposter violemment.
fr.Y: Pour cacher sa queue noire, il vit discrètement dans lobscurité. Il nattaque jamais le premier.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.
en.Y: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent by biting.

fr.X: La tête sur sa queue monte la garde quand il dort. Elle na pas besoin de dormir.
fr.Y: Sa queue possède un cerveau. Si vous vous en approchez, elle vous sentira et vous mordra.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.
en.Y: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.

fr.X: Il renforce sa carapace en y ajoutant des écorces darbre. Il devient alors plus lourd.
fr.Y: Il ressemble à une pomme de pin. Sa carapace le protège des Pokémon Oiseaux qui le picorent par erreur.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
en.Y: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.

fr.X: Il est prisonnier dune coquille dacier. Ses yeux vigilants sont la seule partie visible de son corps.
fr.Y: Il est totalement fixé à son arbre. Il lance des morceaux de sa carapace pour faire fuir son ennemi.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: When spotted, this Pokémon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
en.Y: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.

fr.X: Il senfuit en creusant à reculons dans le sol avec sa queue dès quun ennemi le repère.
fr.Y: Son nid est un véritable labyrinthe quil creuse à laide de sa queue. Il sait à peine voler.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Immunity
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

en.X: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
en.Y: It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

fr.X: Il saccroche souvent aux falaises. Sa proie repérée, il plane vers elle pour lattaquer.
fr.Y: Il vole droit vers le visage de sa cible effrayée et sy accroche pour lui injecter son poison.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

en.X: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
en.Y: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.

fr.X: Grâce à la température élevée et à la haute pression souterraines, son corps est plus dur que le métal.
fr.Y: Ses mâchoires robustes peuvent broyer la pierre. Ses yeux percent la pénombre souterraine.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
en.Y: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

fr.X: Il est dune nature joviale. De nombreuses femmes lapprécient pour sa gentillesse.
fr.Y: Son visage horrible fait fuir les petits Pokémon. Par contre, les femmes le trouvent mignon.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
en.Y: It can make most any Pokémon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.

fr.X: En dépit des apparences, cest un grand timide. Quand il sénerve, il mord de ses énormes crocs.
fr.Y: Il peut faire fuir presque tous les Pokémon en ouvrant très largement sa mâchoire.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Intimidate
hiddenAbilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

en.X: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
en.Y: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.

fr.X: Pour tirer ses dards empoisonnés, il gonfle son corps en buvant 10 l deau subitement.
fr.Y: Son corps est recouvert de pics provenant de ses écailles. Ils sécrètent un poison étourdissant.

abilities.name: Swarm

en.X: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets ahold of into bits.
en.Y: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.

fr.X: Les pinces de ce Pokémon contiennent de lacier et peuvent réduire en miettes quasiment nimporte quoi.
fr.Y: Son corps est dur comme lacier. Il intimide ses ennemis en levant ses pinces pareilles à des yeux.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Contrary
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

en.X: The berries stored in its jar-like shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
en.Y: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

fr.X: Sa carapace, creuse comme une jarre, lui sert à stocker des Baies jusquà ce quelles se transforment en un jus épais et parfumé.
fr.Y: Il garde des Baies dans sa coquille. Pour éviter les attaques, il simmobilise sous un rocher.

en.X: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.
en.Y: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon est si puissant quil peut projeter ses ennemis en lair grâce à ses cornes.
fr.Y: Sa force herculéenne lui permet de soulever et de jeter plus de 100 fois son poids.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

en.X: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
en.Y: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

fr.X: Il se nourrit dufs volés dans des nids. Ses griffes crochues percent les défenses de lennemi.
fr.Y: Ses griffes sont cachées dans ses pattes. Sil est attaqué, il les sort pour frapper ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Pickup

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

en.X: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they’re soaked with honey.
en.Y: Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations.

fr.X: Sa marque en forme de lune brille quand il trouve du miel. Il lèche ses pattes qui en sont toujours couvertes.
fr.Y: Il se fait des réserves de nourriture dans des cachettes avant larrivée de lhiver.

en.X: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
en.Y: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.

fr.X: Avec sa capacité à sentir toute odeur, il trouve sans faillir de la nourriture enfouie dans le sol.
fr.Y: Bien que dune large corpulence, il grimpe aux arbres pour sy nourrir et y dormir.

en.X: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
en.Y: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

fr.X: Commun dans les régions volcaniques, il se déplace sans cesse pour trouver des endroits chauds.
fr.Y: Son corps est fait de magma. Sil cesse de bouger, il refroidit et durcit.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

hiddenAbilities.name: Weak Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

en.X: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
en.Y: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

fr.X: Sa coquille, très fragile, projette régulièrement des flammes qui circulent dans son corps.
fr.Y: Son corps en ébullition est aussi chaud que de la lave. Des flammes sortent de sa coquille.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Thick Fat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

en.X: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
en.Y: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.

fr.X: Il renifle le sol avec sa truffe pour y dénicher de la nourriture. Il trouve parfois des sources thermales.
fr.Y: Sil sent une odeur attirante, il fonce tête baissée pour en trouver lorigine.

en.X: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
en.Y: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

fr.X: Bien que pourvu de courtes pattes, ses sabots sont pointus pour lempêcher de glisser sur la glace.
fr.Y: Ses yeux sont masqués par ses longs poils. Il ne voit rien et se déplace en chargeant.

en.X: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
en.Y: They prefer unpolluted southern seas. Their coral branches lose their color and deteriorate in dirty water.

fr.X: Il grandit en permanence. Les exquises excroissances de sa tête sont très recherchées.
fr.Y: On le trouve souvent dans les mers claires du sud. Leau polluée décolore son corail et le fait dépérir.

abilities.name: Hustle

en.X: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
en.Y: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.

fr.X: Il est très précis quand il crache ses jets deau. Il peut toucher une cible mouvante à 100 m.
fr.Y: Se servant de sa nageoire dorsale, il saccroche sous un Démanta pour récupérer ses restes.

abilities.name: Sniper

en.X: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
en.Y: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

fr.X: Il adore se cacher dans les fissures et les épaves, doù il attaque en crachant de lencre.
fr.Y: Il capture ses ennemis avec ses tentacules et les écrase ensuite avec sa tête dure comme la pierre.

en.X: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
en.Y: It carries food all day long. When someone is lost in the mountains, it shares that food.

fr.X: Il dépose sa nourriture dans sa queue enroulée. Il loffre souvent aux gens égarés en montagne.
fr.Y: Il passe ses journées à transporter de la nourriture. Il loffre souvent aux gens égarés en montagne.

en.X: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.
en.Y: While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.

fr.X: Il peut planer au-dessus des vagues sur plus de 100 m en prenant son élan dans la mer.
fr.Y: Il ignore royalement les Rémoraid qui saccrochent à ses nageoires pour manger les restes quil sème.

en.X: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
en.Y: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

fr.X: Comme il fait son nid dans les ronces, ses petits sendurcissent à force dêtre sans cesse éraflés.
fr.Y: Son corps est prisonnier dune armure dure comme lacier, mais il vole à plus de 300 km/h.

en.X: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.
en.Y: To corner prey, they check each other’s location using barks that only they can understand.

fr.X: Il hurle dès laube pour délimiter son territoire. On lentend à des kilomètres à la ronde.
fr.Y: Pour traquer leur proie, ils se localisent mutuellement avec des aboiements compris par eux seuls.

en.X: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
en.Y: The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins. If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.

fr.X: Jadis, les gens prenaient son étrange hurlement pour lappel de la Faucheuse.
fr.Y: En colère, il crache des flammes contenant une toxine qui peut causer des dégâts irréversibles.

en.X: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
en.Y: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life-forms can survive.

fr.X: On dit quil se cache dans les grottes sous-marines. Il peut créer des tourbillons en bâillant.
fr.Y: Il emmagasine de lénergie en restant dans les fonds marins, là où rien dautre ne peut survivre.

abilities.name: Pickup

hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

en.X: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
en.Y: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

fr.X: Il se cogne sur celui ou celle quil apprécie. Il est cependant si fort quil fait souvent mal.
fr.Y: Il est fort malgré son aspect ramassé. Il na aucun mal à porter un humain adulte sur son dos.

abilities.name: Sturdy

hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

en.X: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
en.Y: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.

fr.X: Il a des défenses aiguisées et une peau épaisse. Ses charges peuvent détruire une maison.
fr.Y: Plus grandes sont ses défenses, plus haut est son rang dans le troupeau. Elles poussent lentement.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.desc: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.desc: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
en.Y: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.

fr.X: Des recherches poussées ont amélioré ses capacités. Il a appris de nouveaux mouvements.
fr.Y: On lui a installé un logiciel de terraformation pour lui permettre de travailler dans lespace.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
en.Y: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.

fr.X: Quiconque observe ses bois ressent une sensation étrange, comme si leur centre lattirait.
fr.Y: Ses bois tordus changent le flot de lair et créent une distorsion spatiale dans la réalité.

en.X: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
en.Y: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

fr.X: Il marque son territoire en maniant sa queue comme un pinceau. On dénombre plus de 5000 marques.
fr.Y: Arrivé à lâge adulte, il laisse ses camarades poser leur empreinte de patte sur son dos.

en.X: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
en.Y: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.

fr.X: Il est plein dénergie. Il se bat tout le temps pour être plus fort, quitte à perdre un combat.
fr.Y: Pour augmenter ses capacités, il cherche à se battre contre nimporte qui. Il est très courageux.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

en.X: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
en.Y: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you’d like.

fr.X: Il combat en tournoyant comme une toupie. La force centrifuge décuple sa puissance destructrice.
fr.Y: Si sa danse de coups de pied vous fascine, vous risquez de le regretter.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.desc: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

hiddenAbilities.name: Hydration
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

en.X: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
en.Y: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

fr.X: Ses lèvres sont la partie la plus sensible de son corps. Il les utilise pour examiner les objets.
fr.Y: Il goûte à tout du bout des lèvres. Elles gardent en mémoire ses goûts et ses dégoûts.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

en.X: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
en.Y: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.

fr.X: Il génère de lélectricité en battant des bras, mais il na aucun moyen de stocker cette énergie.
fr.Y: Ses cornes silluminent lorsquil fait tourner ses bras pour générer de lélectricité.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Vital Spirit
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: It’s small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
en.Y: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

fr.X: La température de son corps peut atteindre 600 °C. Son nez et sa bouche laissent échapper des flammèches.
fr.Y: Son sang est chaud comme du magma et la température de son corps peut atteindre 600 °C.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
en.Y: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

fr.X: Si elle vient davoir un petit, son lait est bien plus nutritif que dhabitude.
fr.Y: Son lait est très nutritif. Cest une boisson parfaite pour les malades et les personnes âgées.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

hiddenAbilities.name: Healer
hiddenAbilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

en.X: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
en.Y: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.

fr.X: Les ufs que pond Leuphorie sont un concentré de bonheur dont une bouchée suffit à apporter la joie.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon au cur dor soigne les Pokémon malades. Il ressent la tristesse dautrui.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Volt Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

en.X: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
en.Y: This rough Pokémon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.

fr.X: Le nuage de pluie quil porte peut relâcher la foudre à volonté. On dit de lui quil est venu avec lorage.
fr.Y: Ce terrible Pokémon emmagasine de lénergie puis court en lançant de puissants éclairs.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Flash Fire
hiddenAbilities.desc: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

en.X: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
en.Y: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

fr.X: Un Pokémon qui parcourt le monde. On dit quil en naît un à chaque fois quun volcan apparaît.
fr.Y: On raconte quà chaque fois quil rugit, un volcan entre en éruption quelque part.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
en.Y: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

fr.X: Il parcourt le vaste monde pour purifier les eaux polluées. Il accompagne le vent du nord.
fr.Y: Il serait la réincarnation du vent du nord. Il peut purifier instantanément les eaux polluées.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

en.X: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.
en.Y: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.

fr.X: Il se nourrit de terre. Une fois quil a absorbé une montagne, il sendort et commence à évoluer.
fr.Y: Il vit très profond sous terre. Il nen sort pour évoluer quaprès avoir dévoré tout ce qui lentourait.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

en.X: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
en.Y: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.

fr.X: Son corps est dur comme la pierre souterraine. Il file comme une fusée en expulsant des gaz.
fr.Y: Sa carapace est aussi dure que la pierre et il est très fort. Ses coups peuvent raser une montagne.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
en.Y: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

fr.X: Dune main seulement il a assez de force pour faire trembler la terre et sécrouler une montagne.
fr.Y: Lorsquil est en colère, il abat des montagnes et enterre des fleuves. On doit alors modifier les cartes.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Multiscale
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage when HP is full.

en.X: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
en.Y: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

fr.X: Il dort dans une faille des grands fonds. Ses battements dailes génèrent une tempête de 40 jours.
fr.Y: Il est supposé être le gardien des sept mers. On raconte quil est apparu une nuit de forte tempête.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
en.Y: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.

fr.X: Son corps brille des sept couleurs de larc-en-ciel, arc-en-ciel qui se constitue derrière lui quand il vole.
fr.Y: Il ne se montre quà un Dresseur au cur pur en dévoilant ses magnifiques ailes colorées.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

en.X: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
en.Y: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon voyage dans le temps. Les forêts où il apparaît deviennent prodigieusement luxuriantes.
fr.Y: Il a le pouvoir de voyager dans le temps. Cependant, on dit quil napparaît quen temps de paix.

abilities.name: Overgrow

hiddenAbilities.name: Unburden

en.X: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
en.Y: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.

fr.X: Arcko peut grimper aux murs à laide de ses pattes. Grâce à sa queue, il est capable de mesurer lhumidité de lair et de prédire le temps du jour suivant.
fr.Y: Les épines de ses plantes de pieds lui permettent de marcher aux murs et au plafond sans tomber.

abilities.name: Overgrow

hiddenAbilities.name: Unburden
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

en.X: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
en.Y: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

fr.X: Les muscles surdéveloppés de ses cuisses permettent à Massko de sauter incroyablement haut.
fr.Y: Il vit dans les jungles denses. Il saute de branche en branche pour approcher de sa proie.

en.X: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
en.Y: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.

fr.X: Les feuilles sur ses bras peuvent trancher des troncs épais. Cest le meilleur combattant des jungles.
fr.Y: Il parcourt la jungle avec agilité et attaque ses proies grâce aux feuilles tranchantes sur ses bras.

en.X: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
en.Y: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

fr.X: Poussifeu possède, dans son ventre, une poche de feu qui brûle sans arrêt. Il donne une impression de chaleur quand on lui fait des câlins.
fr.Y: Ses câlins réchauffent car il renferme une fournaise. Il envoie des boules de feu à 1000 °C.

en.X: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
en.Y: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

fr.X: Ce maître du coup de pied peut donner 10 coups par seconde. Ses cris aigus intimident lennemi.
fr.Y: Au combat, les flammes dans son corps redoublent dintensité. Ses coups de pied sont dévastateurs.

en.X: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
en.Y: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

fr.X: Il peut bondir par-dessus un bâtiment de 30 étages. Ses poings enflammés brûlent ses adversaires.
fr.Y: Quand il est face à un ennemi, il laisse séchapper des gerbes de flammes par ses poignets. Ses jambes lui permettent de sauter par-dessus les immeubles.

en.X: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
en.Y: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

fr.X: Sa grande queue en forme de nageoire lui donne une puissance daccélération incroyable. Il est très costaud malgré sa taille.
fr.Y: Il analyse le courant grâce à la nageoire sur sa tête. Il est assez fort pour soulever des rochers.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

en.X: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
en.Y: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.

fr.X: Ses jambes robustes lui donnent un bon appui, même dans la boue. Il dort enfoui dans la saleté.
fr.Y: À force de marcher et de vivre dans la boue, son arrière-train est devenu particulièrement robuste.

en.X: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.
en.Y: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

fr.X: Un seul coup de ses puissants bras suffit pour pulvériser même les plus gros rochers.
fr.Y: Il peut traîner un grand bateau en nageant. Il assomme lennemi dun grand coup de ses bras épais.

en.X: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
en.Y: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.

fr.X: Un Pokémon très obstiné qui poursuit sa proie jusquà ce quelle soit épuisée.
fr.Y: Medhyèna est dun tempérament tenace. Son odorat très développé lui permet de ne jamais perdre la trace de sa proie.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Quick Feet

hiddenAbilities.name: Moxie
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

en.X: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
en.Y: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

fr.X: Il obéit toujours aux ordres de son Dresseur si celui-ci est très doué. Son comportement vient de lépoque reculée où il vivait en meute.
fr.Y: Les Grahyèna forment des meutes de dix qui excellent au travail de groupe pour capturer leurs proies.

en.X: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
en.Y: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.

fr.X: Il marche en zigzaguant et na pas son pareil pour trouver des objets dans lherbe ou sous terre.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon dune curiosité insatiable. Il montre de lintérêt pour tout ce qui lentoure et passe dun endroit à un autre en zigzaguant pour tout regarder.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

en.X: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
en.Y: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

fr.X: Il peut courir en ligne droite à plus de 100 km/h. Hélas, il nest pas doué pour prendre les virages.
fr.Y: Il fonce sur sa proie à plus de 100 km/h. Mais il ne peut pas dévier sa course et loupe souvent sa cible.

abilities.name: Shield Dust

hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

en.X: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
en.Y: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.

fr.X: Il adore manger des feuilles. Si un Étourmi lattaque, il riposte avec les piquants de son postérieur.
fr.Y: Il habite les forêts et les hautes herbes. Attaqué, il riposte avec les piquants de son postérieur.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

en.X: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
en.Y: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.

fr.X: Il attend dévoluer dans son cocon de soie accroché aux branches et se nourrit deau de pluie.
fr.Y: Il boit la rosée récoltée par sa soie en attendant dévoluer. Il est à labri dans son robuste cocon.

abilities.name: Swarm

hiddenAbilities.name: Rivalry
hiddenAbilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

en.X: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
en.Y: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.

fr.X: Réputé pour les motifs de ses ailes aux couleurs vives. Il allonge sa trompe pour butiner le nectar.
fr.Y: Il est très agressif. Il pique sa proie avec son long museau étroit et absorbe sa vitalité.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

en.X: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
en.Y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.

fr.X: Son corps, constitué de soie fine, durcit avec le temps. Si vous voyez apparaître des fissures, cest quil va très bientôt évoluer.
fr.Y: Rancunier, il noublie aucune des attaques subies dans le cocon et se venge une fois quil a évolué.

en.X: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
en.Y: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon nocturne est attiré par les lueurs de la ville et aime les feuilles des arbres urbains.
fr.Y: Quand on lattaque, il bat des ailes pour répandre sa poudre toxique. Il sort après le coucher du soleil.

en.X: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
en.Y: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

fr.X: Il ressemble à une plante aquatique et fait la navette pour les Pokémon qui ne savent pas nager.
fr.Y: Nénupiot recherche toujours les coins où coule de leau pure. Sil reste longtemps sans boire, la feuille sur sa tête commence à faner.

en.X: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
en.Y: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

fr.X: Il vit au bord de leau dans les endroits ensoleillés. Le jour, il sendort sur un tas dalgues et ne se lève quà la nuit tombée.
fr.Y: Cest un mauvais plaisantin. Quand il repère un pêcheur, il tire sur sa ligne pour le déranger.

en.X: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
en.Y: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.

fr.X: Ses muscles se tonifient au son dune musique entraînante. Il ne peut pas sempêcher de danser.
fr.Y: Les cellules de Ludicolo sactivent sil entend une musique entraînante, le rendant encore plus puissant.

en.X: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
en.Y: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

fr.X: Il se suspend aux branches par lextrémité de sa tête. Il arrive quil tombe sil est pris de panique.
fr.Y: Il ressemble à un gland pendu à une branche. Il adore effrayer les autres Pokémon.

en.X: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
en.Y: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.

fr.X: Le son de sa flûte dherbe déstabilise lauditeur. Il vit au plus profond des forêts.
fr.Y: Il vit au plus profond des forêts. Le son de sa flûte, faite avec la feuille de sa tête, est inquiétant.

en.X: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
en.Y: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon est le gardien des forêts. Il peut lire les pensées de ses ennemis et agir en conséquence.
fr.Y: Dun coup de sa feuille éventail, il génère des bourrasques de 30 m/s capables de souffler une maison.

en.X: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
en.Y: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon téméraire na pas peur daffronter des ennemis puissants. Il vole en quête de climats chauds.
fr.Y: Nirondelle ne supporte pas les saisons froides. Il vole vers dautres terres à la recherche de chaleur et peut ainsi parcourir 300 km par jour.

en.X: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
en.Y: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.

fr.X: Si les plumes de ses deux queues restent bien droites, cela signifie quHélédelle est en bonne santé. Son élégance est sans pareille.
fr.Y: Une fois sa proie repérée, il fond sur elle en un éclair et la capture avec ses griffes acérées.

en.X: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
en.Y: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.

fr.X: Il plane sur les vents marins grâce à ses longues ailes. Il les replie pour se reposer.
fr.Y: Il niche sur les falaises escarpées face à la mer. Il vole en altitude grâce aux courants ascendants.

en.Y: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

fr.X: Il trempe son grand bec dans la mer pour charrier de leau et de nombreuses proies.
fr.Y: Ce messager du ciel transporte petits Pokémon et ufs dans son bec en toute sécurité.

en.Y: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

fr.X: Quand ses cornes captent les ondes positives dun Pokémon ou dun humain, son corps se réchauffe.
fr.Y: Il est très sensible aux émotions des gens et des Pokémon. Il se cache au moindre signe dhostilité.
