en.X: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
en.Y: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon tire ses pouvoirs psy du soutien de son Dresseur. Il danse et tourne sur lui-même quand il est content.
fr.Y: Il peut distordre lespace-temps grâce à ses pouvoirs psy et ainsi voir lavenir.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.desc: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.desc: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
en.Y: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

fr.X: Prêt à tout pour protéger son Dresseur, il peut créer un mini trou noir par sa seule force mentale.
fr.Y: Gardevoir est capable de prédire lavenir. Sa puissance augmente quand il protège son Dresseur.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rain Dish
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

en.X: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
en.Y: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

fr.X: Ils vivent généralement dans les étangs mais, après des averses passagères, on peut en trouver dans des flaques au milieu des villes.
fr.Y: Il semble patiner sur leau. Le parfum diffusé par le sommet de sa tête sert à attirer ses proies.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
en.Y: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.

fr.X: Des motifs en forme dyeux ornent ses antennes. Ses quatre ailes laident à voler dans toutes les directions.
fr.Y: Ses quatre ailes permettent à ce Pokémon de voler dans toutes les directions.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.desc: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

hiddenAbilities.name: Quick Feet
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

en.X: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
en.Y: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

fr.X: Il préfère les endroits humides. La journée, il reste à la lisière de la forêt. Il libère de la poudre toxique par sa tête.
fr.Y: Le sommet de sa tête libère des spores empoisonnées. Il est dangereux de les inhaler.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.desc: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

hiddenAbilities.name: Technician
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

en.X: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
en.Y: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.

fr.X: Ses petits bras sétendent quand il donne un coup de poing. Son talent égale celui dun boxeur pro.
fr.Y: Il frappe de toutes ses forces ses ennemis étourdis par ses spores empoisonnées.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.desc: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

en.X: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
en.Y: If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.

fr.X: Rien quà voir un Parecool, on na plus envie de bouger et on sendort.
fr.Y: Il dort 20 heures par jour et ne fait rien dautre, si ce nest manger trois ou quatre feuilles dans la journée.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can’t sit still for one second.
en.Y: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.

fr.X: Son cur bat tellement vite que son sang bout dans ses veines, lempêchant de rester immobile même une seconde.
fr.Y: Quand il ne bouge pas, il accumule du stress et devient très irritable.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.desc: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

en.X: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.
en.Y: It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

fr.X: Le Pokémon le plus fainéant du monde. Il bouge quand il a mangé tout ce qui était à portée de main.
fr.Y: Cest le Pokémon le plus paresseux du monde. Il est cependant capable de libérer une puissance phénoménale en une seule attaque.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

hiddenAbilities.name: Run Away
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

en.X: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
en.Y: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.

fr.X: Comme il vit presque toujours sous terre, sa vue est très peu développée et il est presque aveugle. Il utilise ses antennes pour se repérer.
fr.Y: Il peut passer jusquà dix ans sous terre. Les racines des arbres constituent son régime alimentaire.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.desc: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
en.Y: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

fr.X: Cest la migraine assurée quand il pousse son cri perçant. On le perd facilement de vue tant il est vif.
fr.Y: Il bouge si vite que lil a parfois du mal à le suivre. Les Pokémon de cette espèce se regroupent près de la sève des arbres.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.desc: Only supereffective moves will hit.

en.X: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
en.Y: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

fr.X: Une carapace dinsecte laissée à labandon. On dit quil vole lâme de celui qui regarde à lintérieur.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon étrange que lon trouve dans les Poké Balls après lévolution dun Ningale.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
en.Y: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.

fr.X: Il communique en murmurant, mais se met à hurler sil sent le moindre danger. Il sarrête quand on lui bouche les oreilles.
fr.Y: Il repousse ses ennemis grâce à un cri aussi puissant que le bruit dun avion à réaction.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
en.Y: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

fr.X: Grâce à ses puissants muscles abdominaux, il peut crier en expulsant lair quil avait aspiré.
fr.Y: Londe de choc provoquée par son cri peut renverser un camion. Il trépigne pour augmenter sa force.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
en.Y: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.

fr.X: Son hurlement sentend à 10 km à la ronde. Ses orifices émettent toutes sortes de bruits.
fr.Y: Au combat, son hurlement fait trembler le sol comme un séisme.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sheer Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

en.X: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
en.Y: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.

fr.X: Il fonce sur des arbres larges pour fortifier son corps robuste et son cur vaillant.
fr.Y: Il suit un entraînement drastique pour devenir encore plus fort. Cest un Pokémon plein de volonté, et capable de faire face à toutes les attaques.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sheer Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

en.X: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
en.Y: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

fr.X: Il piétine le sol violemment pour concentrer son énergie. Il peut envoyer en lair un camion de 10 t dun seul coup de poing.
fr.Y: Il aime mesurer sa force à celle des plus grands Pokémon. Ses coups de paume peuvent projeter un camion.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
en.Y: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.

fr.X: Un Pokémon qui vit près de leau. Au sol, il se déplace rapidement en rebondissant sur sa grosse queue.
fr.Y: Il fait tournoyer sa queue, connue pour ses qualités nutritives, pour labattre comme une puissante massue sur lennemi.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.desc: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
en.Y: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.

fr.X: Son nez polarisé lui permet de se défendre en augmentant son magnétisme et en attirant tout objet métallique.
fr.Y: Son nez magnétique pointe constamment vers le nord. Les voyageurs lobservent pour connaître leur position.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.desc: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

hiddenAbilities.name: Wonder Skin
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

en.X: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
en.Y: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.

fr.X: Il poursuit tout ce qui bouge. On le voit parfois courir en cercle, chassant sa propre queue.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon très mignon qui aime parfois courir en cercle en chassant sa propre queue.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.desc: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

hiddenAbilities.name: Wonder Skin
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

en.X: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
en.Y: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

fr.X: Il déteste la saleté et passe son temps à entretenir sa fourrure, confortablement installé.
fr.Y: Les femmes Dresseurs raffolent de sa sublime fourrure. Il ne possède pas de nid.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Stall
abilities.desc: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
en.Y: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

fr.X: À force de manger des gemmes, les yeux de ce Pokémon des grottes obscures sont devenus des joyaux.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon vit dans les grottes obscures et mange des gemmes quil déterre avec ses griffes acérées.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter

en.X: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
en.Y: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

fr.X: Il utilise son visage charmeur pour tromper ses ennemis avant de les mordre avec ses énormes mâchoires.
fr.Y: Ses cornes forment une grande mâchoire attachée à sa tête. Elle peut broyer des barres de fer.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Heavy Metal
hiddenAbilities.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

en.X: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
en.Y: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.

fr.X: Il vit habituellement au cur des montagnes. Affamé, il dévore parfois des rails et des voitures.
fr.Y: Larmure dacier qui recouvre son corps sémiette quand il évolue pour laisser place à une nouvelle.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Heavy Metal
hiddenAbilities.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

en.X: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
en.Y: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.

fr.X: Il raffole du minerai de fer. Il défend son territoire en chargeant avec son corps dacier.
fr.Y: Pour montrer sa force à ses ennemis, Galegon frotte son corps dacier contre les rochers pour produire de gigantesques étincelles.

en.X: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
en.Y: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

fr.X: Il établit son territoire sur toute une montagne. Ses cicatrices indiquent son expérience : plus il en a, plus il est fort !
fr.Y: Il creuse des galeries à travers la pierre avec ses cornes dacier pour trouver le fer quil apprécie.

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
en.Y: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.

fr.X: Son entraînement dermite lui permet de léviter par le seul pouvoir de la méditation.
fr.Y: Il ne mange quune Baie par jour. La faim lui a forgé une volonté de fer.

abilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

en.X: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
en.Y: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.

fr.X: Charmina évite les attaques en exécutant délégants pas de danse avant de lancer une attaque dévastatrice dans son élan.
fr.Y: Ses pouvoirs psy, renforcés par la pratique du yoga, lui permettent de prédire les mouvements ennemis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

en.X: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
en.Y: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

fr.X: Il améliore ses réflexes en stimulant ses muscles grâce à lélectricité dans sa fourrure.
fr.Y: Dynavolt stocke de lélectricité statique dans sa fourrure. Il produit des étincelles lorsque le temps devient orageux.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod

en.X: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
en.Y: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon évite le contact des humains. On raconte quil fait son nid là où la foudre est déjà tombée.
fr.Y: Il libère lélectricité par sa crinière. Il crée un nuage dorage pour appeler la foudre.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

hiddenAbilities.name: Lightning Rod
hiddenAbilities.desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

en.X: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
en.Y: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.

fr.X: Il absorbe lénergie des poteaux électriques et encourage ses amis avec des pompons détincelles.
fr.Y: Il absorbe lénergie des poteaux électriques et court-circuite son corps pour produire du bruit.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

hiddenAbilities.name: Volt Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

en.X: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
en.Y: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

fr.X: Lélectricité de Posipi et Négapi favorise la circulation sanguine et guérit les courbatures.
fr.Y: Il encourage ses amis. Son corps produit plus détincelles quand il est en mauvaise posture.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
en.Y: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

fr.X: Il communique avec ses pairs en allumant son postérieur la nuit. Il adore le doux parfum de Lumivole.
fr.Y: Il vit aux abords des étangs. La nuit, son corps émet de la lumière pour communiquer avec dautres Muciole.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
en.Y: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

fr.X: Il utilise son doux parfum pour aider Muciole à décrire plus de 200 arabesques dans le ciel nocturne.
fr.Y: Il utilise son doux parfum pour aider Muciole à décrire des arabesques dans le ciel nocturne.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Leaf Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

en.X: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
en.Y: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.

fr.X: Chacune de ses mains sécrète un poison différent. Plus un Rosélia est en bonne santé, plus ses parfums sont puissants.
fr.Y: Les Rosélia arrosés avec une eau de source riche en nutriments prendraient des couleurs uniques.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.desc: Damages attackers using any draining move.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gluttony
hiddenAbilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

en.X: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
en.Y: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

fr.X: Son corps est principalement constitué dun estomac dont les sucs digestifs dissolvent tout.
fr.Y: Il ny a rien que son estomac ne puisse digérer. Pendant sa digestion, il laisse séchapper des gaz très bruyants et nauséabonds.

en.X: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
en.Y: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.

fr.X: Il avale tout en une bouchée. Ses follicules sécrètent des fluides toxiques qui endorment lennemi.
fr.Y: Il avale tout en une bouchée. Ses sucs digestifs peuvent digérer nimporte quoi.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.desc: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

en.X: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
en.Y: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

fr.X: Il sattaque en banc aux bateaux dont il dévore la coque. Les rivières de la jungle forment son habitat.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon vit dans les fleuves qui traversent les forêts tropicales. Il attaque en groupe ceux qui saventurent sur son territoire.

en.X: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
en.Y: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.

fr.X: Ses crocs lacèrent des feuilles dacier. Il nage à 120 km/h. On lappelle «tyran des mers».
fr.Y: Ce petit voyou fend les mers en se propulsant à 120 km/h grâce à son postérieur.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

hiddenAbilities.name: Pressure
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

en.X: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
en.Y: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.

fr.X: Il rebondit comme un ballon pour samuser. Plus il boit deau, plus il va haut.
fr.Y: Il mange près dune tonne de nourriture par jour. Jouer avec son jet deau est son passe-temps favori.

en.X: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
en.Y: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

fr.X: Lénorme fracas résultant de ses sauts par-dessus les vagues peut faire perdre connaissance à ses adversaires.
fr.Y: Le plus grand des Pokémon. Il peut plonger à une profondeur de 3000 m en retenant son souffle.

en.X: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
en.Y: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.

fr.X: Son dos bossu renferme une lave bouillonnante. Elle refroidit par temps de pluie, ce qui le ralentit.
fr.Y: Son corps renferme une lave à plus de 1200 °C. Sa bosse se contracte lorsquil utilise des capacités de type Feu.

en.X: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.
en.Y: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

fr.X: Les volcans sur son dos entrent en éruption tous les dix ans ou chaque fois quil se met en colère.
fr.Y: Sil sénerve, Camérupt fait jaillir de la lave en fusion par les bosses qui se trouvent sur son dos. Il vit dans les cratères des volcans.

en.X: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
en.Y: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

fr.X: Les Chartor vivent dans les mines abandonnées, où ils extraient le charbon avec ardeur.
fr.Y: Il tire son énergie du charbon quil brûle dans sa carapace et crache de la suie noire en cas de danger.

en.X: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
en.Y: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.

fr.X: Il utilise sa queue comme un ressort et bondit partout. Chaque nouveau choc fait battre son cur.
fr.Y: Il rebondit sur sa queue pour faire battre son cur. La perle sur sa tête vient dun Coquiperl.

en.X: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.
en.Y: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

fr.X: Les perles noires amplifient ses pouvoirs psychiques, lui permettant de contrôler ses ennemis avec sa danse étrange.
fr.Y: Les perles noires amplifient ses pouvoirs psy. Sa danse étrange lui permet de contrôler ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.desc: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

en.X: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
en.Y: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.

fr.X: Les motifs sur leur fourrure sont propres à chaque Spinda. Son pas chancelant le rend difficile à viser.
fr.Y: La chance que deux Spinda avec les mêmes motifs se rencontrent est de moins dune pour quatre milliards.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.desc: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sheer Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

en.X: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
en.Y: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

fr.X: Il vit dans les déserts arides. Pour attraper ses proies, il se place dans un trou et laisse sa gueule grande ouverte en attendant quelles tombent dedans.
fr.Y: Il creuse puis attend ses proies dans son antre, un trou conique dont il est impossible de séchapper.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
en.Y: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.

fr.X: Ses violents battements dailes génèrent des vagues dultrasons qui donnent dintenses migraines.
fr.Y: Il génère des ondes ultrasoniques en battant violemment des ailes. Dès que sa proie est inconsciente, il larrose dacide pour pouvoir lavaler.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
en.Y: Known as “The Desert Spirit,” this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

fr.X: Il se cache du regard des autres en soulevant le sable du désert avec ses ailes. Une fine peau rouge protège ses yeux du sable.
fr.Y: On lappelle «esprit du désert». Son puissant battement dailes provoque des tempêtes de sable qui le dissimulent.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
en.Y: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

fr.X: Cacnea vit dans les zones arides. Une fois par an, une fleur jaune éclot sur sa tête.
fr.Y: Il se sent plus à laise dans des endroits hostiles comme le désert. Il peut survivre 30 jours en utilisant seulement leau stockée dans son corps.

abilities.name: Sand Veil

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
en.Y: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

fr.X: Il sort la nuit pour chasser. Il traque les proies épuisées après une journée dans le désert.
fr.Y: Les Cacturne traquent en groupe les voyageurs du désert, guettant les signes de fatigue pour frapper.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

hiddenAbilities.name: Cloud Nine
hiddenAbilities.desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

en.X: For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.
en.Y: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

fr.X: Son jeu préféré : se poser sur la tête des gens et se faire passer pour un joli chapeau.
fr.Y: Il toilette constamment ses ailes duveteuses. Il se dépêche de se laver à la moindre salissure pour que ses ailes restent le plus blanc possible.

en.X: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
en.Y: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

fr.X: Il vole doucement dans le ciel. Ceux qui lentendent fredonner sont comme plongés dans un rêve.
fr.Y: Il vole librement en se cachant dans les nuages. Son chant est digne de celui de la plus douée des sopranos.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

hiddenAbilities.name: Toxic Boost
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

en.X: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
en.Y: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.

fr.X: Cest le rival de Séviper depuis des générations. Ses griffes aiguisées sont son meilleur atout.
fr.Y: Son poil se hérisse dès quil sent un Séviper. Il lacère ses ennemis avec ses griffes acérées.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
en.Y: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.

fr.X: Il rivalise avec Mangriff grâce à la lame affûtée de sa queue qui sécrète un puissant venin.
fr.Y: Il affûte la lame de sa queue sur des rochers pour la rendre bien tranchante. Le rival de longue date de Mangriff.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
en.Y: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

fr.X: On suppose quil est lié au cycle lunaire, car il ne sort que les soirs de pleine lune.
fr.Y: Il a été découvert dans le cratère dune météorite il y a 40 ans. Son simple regard endort ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
en.Y: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

fr.X: Il tire sa force de lénergie solaire. Il est donc particulièrement à laise en journée. Il sillumine quand il tourne.
fr.Y: Solaroc absorbe lénergie du soleil pendant la journée. Toujours impassible, il parvient à lire les pensées de ses ennemis.

en.X: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
en.Y: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.

fr.X: Il enduit son corps dune substance visqueuse pour glisser et se libérer quand on lagrippe.
fr.Y: Ses barbillons font un excellent radar qui lui permet de repérer ses proies, même en eau trouble.

en.X: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
en.Y: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

fr.X: Il a besoin dun étang entier pour vivre. Si un ennemi sapproche, il sénerve et déclenche un séisme.
fr.Y: Il fait son nid au fond des marais. Il ne se pose pas de questions et avale toutes les créatures qui passent près de lui.

en.X: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
en.Y: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

fr.X: Sa nature robuste lui permet de prospérer dans nimporte quelles eaux, aussi polluées soient-elles.
fr.Y: Sa nature robuste lui permet de vivre sur nimporte quel terrain. Ses pinces ne lâchent jamais prise.

en.X: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
en.Y: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.

fr.X: Cest un voyou qui utilise ses pinces pour chasser les autres Pokémon hors de sa mare.
fr.Y: Cest un voyou qui utilise ses pinces pour chasser les autres Pokémon hors de son territoire.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
en.Y: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

fr.X: Il se déplace en tournoyant sur son pied. Même mis sur la tête, il peut continuer à tourner.
fr.Y: Il se déplace en tournoyant sur son pied. Ce Pokémon rare fut découvert dans de vieilles ruines.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
en.Y: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.

fr.X: Une ancienne figurine dargile qui sest animée suite à son exposition à un rayon de lumière étrange.
fr.Y: Une figurine dargile fabriquée par une civilisation vieille de 20000 ans et amenée à la vie.

abilities.name: Suction Cups

hiddenAbilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

en.X: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
en.Y: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

fr.X: Il attrape ses proies avec ses tentacules-pétales. Il a disparu il y a cent millions dannées.
fr.Y: Il vivait au fond de la mer il y a 100 millions dannées. La science a permis de le ressusciter.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.desc: Negates all moves that force switching out.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

en.X: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
en.Y: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

fr.X: Vit dans les hauts-fonds des mers chaudes. Il déterre sa proie du sable quand la marée se retire.
fr.Y: Lorsquil chasse, Vacilys utilise ses huit tentacules. Il dissout sa proie à laide dun puissant acide avant de lavaler.

abilities.name: Battle Armor

en.X: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
en.Y: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.

fr.X: Cest un Pokémon préhistorique. Caché derrière les rochers, il utilise ses pinces extensibles pour attraper ses proies.
fr.Y: Un ancêtre Pokémon réanimé à partir dun fossile. Il vivait en mer et chassait avec ses pinces.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swift Swim
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

en.X: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
en.Y: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon au corps blindé peut allonger ou rétracter ses énormes pinces pour embrocher ses proies.
fr.Y: Rien ne peut transpercer la cuirasse dArmaldo. Ce Pokémon embroche ses proies avec ses griffes pour les avaler plus facilement.

abilities.name: Swift Swim

en.X: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
en.Y: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.

fr.X: Il peut vivre dans les fleuves et les lacs pollués car il mange de tout. Personne ne se soucie de lui.
fr.Y: Son apparence est pathétique. Il forme des bancs dans les rivières riches en plantes aquatiques.

hiddenAbilities.name: Cute Charm
hiddenAbilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

en.X: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
en.Y: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.

fr.X: Milobellus est dune beauté à couper le souffle. Ceux qui en voient un perdent aussitôt lenvie de se battre.
fr.Y: Le plus beau Pokémon du monde. De nombreuses uvres dart représentent Milobellus.

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.desc: Castform transforms with the weather.

en.X: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
en.Y: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.

fr.X: Les variations de température ou dhumidité affectent sa structure cellulaire et son apparence.
fr.Y: Morphéo a la capacité de changer son apparence en fonction du temps. Il utilise la force de la nature pour combattre.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Protean
hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

en.X: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
en.Y: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.

fr.X: Il change de couleur à volonté, mais le motif en zigzag qui orne son ventre reste le même.
fr.Y: Il se fond dans son environnement en changeant de couleur, mais le motif sur son ventre reste le même.

abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice--or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.
en.Y: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon, très actif la nuit, utilise sa corne pour se repaître de rancune ou de jalousie.
fr.Y: Il aime le goût de la vengeance. Les Pokémon de cette espèce vivent en rangs sous les gouttières des gens vindicatifs.

en.X: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
en.Y: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

fr.X: Une poupée mue par la tristesse qui la ronge depuis quon la délaissée. Elle recherche son propriétaire.
fr.Y: Un très violent sentiment de haine a transformé une poupée de chiffon en Branette. Sil ouvre la bouche, une énergie négative sen échappe.

en.X: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
en.Y: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.

fr.X: Il poursuit assidûment sa proie, où quelle aille. Il nabandonne sa traque quau lever du soleil.
fr.Y: On dit que Skelénox emporte les enfants désobéissants à la nuit tombée.

hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
en.Y: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.

fr.X: Il aspire lâme de ceux qui regardent dans son corps creux où rougeoie son unique il.
fr.Y: Son corps est creux. On raconte que celui qui regarde à lintérieur finira aspiré par le néant.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

hiddenAbilities.name: Harvest
hiddenAbilities.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.

en.X: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
en.Y: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It’s a highly favored tropical snack.

fr.X: Ses grandes feuilles lui servent à voler. Il distribue les fruits qui pendent à son cou aux enfants, qui sen régalent.
fr.Y: Les succulents fruits de son cou poussent deux fois lan et font le régal des enfants des tropiques.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
en.Y: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.

fr.X: Il se suspend sous une branche ou un auvent avec la ventouse de sa tête. Son langage comporte sept cris.
fr.Y: Il émet des cris à ultrasons et chevauche le vent pour parcourir de grandes distances.

en.X: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
en.Y: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

fr.X: Il pressent les catastrophes et napparaît aux gens que pour les prévenir dun danger imminent.
fr.Y: Absol apparaît dès quune catastrophe naturelle est sur le point de se produire. Pour cette raison, les gens ont longtemps pensé quil portait malheur.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
en.Y: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

fr.X: Okéoké adore se déplacer en groupe. Ils se réunissent souvent pour dormir la nuit dans les cavernes.
fr.Y: Il se muscle en bousculant ses semblables lors de mêlées. Il raffole des fruits sucrés.

en.X: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
en.Y: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.

fr.X: On dit que des groupes entiers de Stalgamin vivent en harmonie sous des feuilles gigantesques.
fr.Y: Selon un vieux dicton des régions enneigées : «Stalgamin dans la maison, richesse à lhorizon».

abilities.name: Ice Body

fr.X: Il se déplace en roulant, car il nest pas doué pour la nage. Quand il est heureux, il applaudit avec ses nageoires.
fr.Y: Son corps est couvert dune douce fourrure. Elle le protège du sentiment de froid quand il se déplace en roulant sur la glace.

en.X: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
en.Y: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.

fr.X: Il utilise son museau hypersensible pour toucher et comprendre tout ce quil voit pour la première fois.
fr.Y: Pour samuser, il fait tourner tout ce qui est rond sur son museau, quil sagisse de Poké Balls ou dObalie.

en.X: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
en.Y: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.

fr.X: Il brise la glace avec ses grosses défenses. Sa graisse le protège du froid, mais aussi des attaques.
fr.Y: Ses robustes défenses pulvérisent la glace, et son épaisse couche de graisse repousse les attaques.

en.X: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
en.Y: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

fr.X: Il ne produit quune perle durant son existence, quand il évolue. Elle amplifie les pouvoirs psychiques.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon ferme sa coquille pour se protéger du danger. Il ne crée quune seule perle de toute sa vie, mais celle-ci est magnifique.

abilities.name: Swift Swim

en.X: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
en.Y: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

fr.X: Il vit dans les abysses, là où la lumière ne va jamais. Il allume le bout de sa queue, qui ressemble à un poisson, pour attirer ses proies.
fr.Y: Il vit loin sous la mer. Il appâte les proies crédules avec sa queue qui rappelle un petit poisson.

abilities.name: Swift Swim

en.Y: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

fr.X: Au printemps, son corps rose se fait plus vif sans que lon sache pourquoi. Il vit au fond de la mer.
fr.Y: Sa façon de se déplacer sous leau est dune élégance incomparable. Du bout de sa fine bouche, il se nourrit des algues qui poussent entre les rochers.

en.Y: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

fr.X: Relicanth na connu aucune évolution depuis 100 millions dannées. Il a été découvert pendant une exploration dans les profondeurs de la mer.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon rare aperçu lors dune exploration sous-marine. Il na pas évolué depuis 100 millions dannées.

en.Y: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

fr.X: Un habitant des mers chaudes. On dit que le couple qui tombe sur ce Pokémon connaîtra lamour éternel.
fr.Y: Pendant la saison des amours, dinnombrables Lovdisc se réunissent près des barrières de corail et donnent limpression que la mer est rose.

fr.X: Il réduit en miettes les plus gros rochers grâce à son cou musculeux et à sa tête dure comme lacier.
fr.Y: Il rêve de pouvoir voler un jour. Pour lheure, il sentraîne en sautant du haut des falaises.

fr.Y: Son corps renforcé repousse toutes les attaques. Cependant, le poids important de cette armure empêche Drackhaus de se déplacer librement.

fr.Y: Son corps est fait de glace datant de lère glaciaire. Il contrôle un air gelé de -200 °C.

fr.Y: Son corps, plus dur que nimporte quel métal, serait creux selon les dernières analyses scientifiques.

en.X: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

fr.Y: Un Pokémon très intelligent qui comprend le langage humain. Il déteste se battre.

fr.Y: Ce Pokémon légendaire incarne la terre. Il plongea dans un profond sommeil après son combat avec Kyogre.

fr.Y: On ne la vu pour la première fois que très récemment car il vit dans la lointaine couche dozone.

en.X: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
en.Y: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

fr.X: Lélectricité libérée par ses griffes peut assommer lennemi. Il vit en petits groupes.
fr.Y: Le courant qui circule à la pointe de ses griffes est capable de faire perdre connaissance à ses proies.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

hiddenAbilities.name: Guts
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

en.X: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.
en.Y: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.

fr.X: Quand ses yeux se dorent, il peut repérer une proie cachée, même si elle est derrière un mur.
fr.Y: Sa capacité à voir à travers tout est très utile pour détecter les moindres dangers.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Leaf Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

en.X: When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
en.Y: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

fr.X: Son bourgeon souvre une fois gorgé de soleil et libère du pollen. Il vit près des sources deau pure.
fr.Y: En hiver, son bourgeon se referme pour résister au froid. Il souvre au printemps et libère du pollen.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Technician
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

en.X: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
en.Y: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

fr.X: Il attire ses proies grâce à son parfum, puis les empoisonne ou les étouffe à laide de ses bras vénéneux.
fr.Y: Gracieux comme un danseur, il abat ses fouets ornés dépines empoisonnées.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sheer Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

en.X: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
en.Y: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.

fr.X: On la ressuscité à partir dun fossile de fer en forme de balle. Il abat ses proies à coups de tête.
fr.Y: Il vivait dans la jungle il y a 100 millions dannées. Il peut abattre un arbre dun coup de tête.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sheer Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

en.X: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
en.Y: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.

fr.X: À force de cogner son crâne pourtant hyper résistant, Charkos a un cerveau atrophié.
fr.Y: Son crâne est dur comme du fer. Cette brute abat des arbres quand elle chasse sa proie dans la jungle.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Soundproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

en.X: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
en.Y: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.

fr.X: Il a lhabitude de polir son visage en le frottant contre un tronc. Il craint les attaques dans le dos.
fr.Y: Il est né dun fossile datant de 100 millions dannées. Son visage est très dur.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Soundproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

en.X: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
en.Y: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

fr.X: En groupe, ils protègent leurs petits en formant autour deux une impénétrable muraille.
fr.Y: Il résiste à toute attaque frontale. Cest un Pokémon docile qui se nourrit dherbe et de Baies.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
en.Y: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

fr.X: Pour se protéger des vents glacés de lhiver, il sest tissé une cape de feuilles et de brindilles.
fr.Y: Sil perd sa cape au combat, il en tisse rapidement une nouvelle avec ce qui lui tombe sous la main.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
en.Y: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

fr.X: Son apparence varie selon le lieu dévolution. Son corps est façonné avec les matériaux à disposition.
fr.Y: Quand Cheniti a évolué, sa cape a fusionné avec son corps. Cheniselle ne sen sépare jamais.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Tinted Lens
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

en.X: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
en.Y: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

fr.X: Il aime le nectar des fleurs et nhésite pas à voler celui que récupère Apitrini.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon sactive à la nuit tombée pour voler le miel des Apitrini pendant leur sommeil.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hiddenAbilities.name: Hustle
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

en.X: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
en.Y: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

fr.X: Ce trio inséparable depuis la naissance récolte du miel pour satisfaire Apireine.
fr.Y: Il récolte le nectar et lamène à la colonie. La nuit, les Pokémon de cette espèce sassemblent pour bâtir une ruche et sendormir.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
en.Y: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

fr.X: Son abdomen abrite ses petits. Ce Pokémon utilise des phéromones pour leur donner des ordres.
fr.Y: Son abdomen est un rayon où vivent ses larves, élevées avec le nectar récolté par Apitrini.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Volt Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

en.X: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
en.Y: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

fr.X: Il roule des boules de poils pleines délectricité statique et les range dans des souches avec des Baies.
fr.Y: Il arrive que deux Pachirisu se frottent les joues pour partager lélectricité quils ont accumulée.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

en.X: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
en.Y: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

fr.X: Il nage en faisant tournoyer ses deux queues comme une hélice. Sa bouée saffaisse quand il plonge.
fr.Y: Il utilise la bouée autour de son cou pour passer sa tête hors de leau et observer les alentours.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

en.X: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
en.Y: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

fr.X: Il flotte grâce à sa bouée très développée. Il vole au secours des gens sur le point de se noyer.
fr.Y: Il a développé une bouée pour poursuivre ses proies aquatiques. Elle fait office de canot gonflable.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

en.X: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
en.Y: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

fr.X: Il rougit au soleil. Quand la petite boule est à court de nutriments, elle fane en signe dévolution.
fr.Y: Il aspire les nutriments de sa petite boule pour pouvoir évoluer.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.desc: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

en.X: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
en.Y: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.

fr.X: Une fois gorgé de soleil, il déploie ses pétales et bouge avec vivacité.
fr.Y: Sous un grand soleil, il ouvre ses pétales pour en absorber les rayons.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
en.Y: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.

fr.X: Un étrange liquide mauve séchappe de son corps, ne lui appuyez pas dessus.
fr.Y: Il change facilement de couleur ou de forme en fonction de son environnement.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold

abilities.name: Storm Drain

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
en.Y: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

fr.X: Attaqué par un prédateur, il fuit en libérant un liquide mauve.
fr.Y: Jadis, il semble quil portait une grande carapace pour se protéger. Il hante les eaux peu profondes.

abilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

en.X: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
en.Y: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

fr.X: Ils vivent en grandes colonies et relient leurs queues pour former un anneau en signe damitié.
fr.Y: Il se nourrit de noix quil épluche avec ses deux queues habiles. Il utilise de moins en moins ses bras.

en.X: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
en.Y: These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.

fr.X: Un Pokémon né de lesprit des gens et des Pokémon. Il aime les saisons chaudes et humides.
fr.Y: Les enfants qui attrapent des Baudrive disparaissent parfois. On lui donne le surnom de «bouée des esprits égarés».

abilities.name: Aftermath

abilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

hiddenAbilities.name: Flare Boost
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up special attacks when burned.

en.X: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
en.Y: It’s drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

fr.X: Il peut embarquer des gens et des Pokémon, mais nul ne sait où il va atterrir car il ne fait que flotter.
fr.Y: Il somnole la journée et senvole en grands groupes le soir venu. Nul ne sait où ils vont.

hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

en.X: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
en.Y: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.

fr.X: Ses oreilles repliées se déroulent avec une force capable de briser un gros rocher.
fr.Y: Il dresse les oreilles quand il sent un danger. Il dort la tête dans sa fourrure pendant les nuits froides.

abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

en.X: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
en.Y: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

fr.X: Il détecte le moindre danger. Il file discrètement par petits bonds rapides quand il se sent menacé.
fr.Y: Il est capable de décocher de puissants coups de pied si on touche à ses délicates oreilles.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
en.Y: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

fr.X: Il psalmodie des incantations. Ce sont souvent des malédictions, mais certaines apportent la joie.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon insaisissable qui tourmente ses ennemis avec son cri semblable à une incantation.

hiddenAbilities.name: Moxie
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

en.X: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”
en.Y: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

fr.X: Son cri profond peut invoquer une meute de Cornèbre. On lappelle «le crieur de mauvais augure».
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon nocturne évolue en grandes volées escortées par des Cornèbre.

abilities.name: Limber

en.X: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
en.Y: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

fr.X: Il griffe quand il est en colère et ronronne quand il est heureux. Certains aiment ce côté lunatique.
fr.Y: Lorsquil est heureux, sa queue décrit des arabesques comme un ruban de gymnastique rythmique.

abilities.name: Own Tempo

en.X: It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
en.Y: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

fr.X: Il nhésitera pas à voler le nid dautres Pokémon et à sy installer si celui-ci est confortable.
fr.Y: Il ceinture sa taille de sa queue bifide pour paraître plus imposant.

en.X: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
en.Y: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

fr.X: Il produit un bruit de sonnerie à chaque bond. Il assourdit lennemi avec ses cris à haute fréquence.
fr.Y: Quand il sautille, lorbe quil a dans la bouche sagite et tinte comme une cloche.

en.X: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
en.Y: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

fr.X: Son derrière propulse un fluide nauséabond qui peut faire fuir les Pokémon dans un rayon de 2 km.
fr.Y: Il se protège en expulsant un fluide nocif par son derrière. La puanteur dure 24 heures.

en.X: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
en.Y: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

fr.X: Il attaque en projetant un liquide fétide du bout de sa queue. Il peut tirer à 50 m.
fr.Y: Sa queue projette un fluide puant. Plus on le laisse sécouler et plus son odeur est insoutenable.

en.X: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.
en.Y: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

fr.X: Les gens croyaient autrefois que les motifs de son dos renfermaient une puissance mystique.
fr.Y: Il rappelle des objets trouvés dans des sépultures anciennes. Nul ne sait sils sont liés.

abilities.name: Heatproof

abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
en.Y: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

fr.X: Il a longtemps été célébré pour avoir apporté la pluie. On le trouve parfois enterré dans le sol.
fr.Y: On croyait autrefois que lui adresser des prières faisait pleuvoir et assurait les récoltes.

abilities.name: Rock Head

abilities.name: Sturdy

en.X: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.
en.Y: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

fr.X: Il préfère les sols arides. Il évacue leau par ses yeux pour réguler ses fluides corporels.
fr.Y: Adepte des climats secs, il régule son humidité en laissant couler ce qui ressemble à des larmes.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.desc: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.

en.X: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
en.Y: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

fr.X: Il déstabilise ses ennemis en imitant leurs mouvements et profite de leur stupeur pour décamper.
fr.Y: Il imite ses ennemis. Une fois imités, ils ne peuvent plus quitter ce Pokémon des yeux.

en.X: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
en.Y: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.

fr.X: Ptiravi transporte un caillou rond en forme duf dans sa poche ventrale pour loffrir à ses amis.
fr.Y: Il prend soin de ses bouclettes et couve son caillou comme si cétait son uf.

en.X: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.
en.Y: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

fr.X: Il reproduit le cri de ses ennemis pour faire croire quil est des leurs et éviter dêtre attaqué.
fr.Y: On peut lui enseigner quelques mots. Sil sagit dun groupe, ils retiendront les mêmes phrases.

abilities.name: Pressure

hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
en.Y: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

fr.X: Un Pokémon composé de 108 esprits. Il provient dune fissure dans une clé de voûte étrange.
fr.Y: Il fut emprisonné dans la fissure dune clé de voûte étrange en guise de punition il y a 500 ans.

en.Y: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

fr.X: Il niche dans des cavités chauffées par géothermie, dont il bondit pour déchiqueter tout intrus.

fr.X: Toujours à la recherche dobjets brillants, il arpente les grottes pour constituer son butin.
fr.Y: Carmache accumule les pierres précieuses quil déterre quand il entreprend dagrandir son nid.

en.X: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
en.Y: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

fr.X: Quand il se recroqueville et étend ses ailes, on dirait un chasseur. Sa vitesse est supersonique.
fr.Y: Il vole à la vitesse dun avion à réaction et ne lâche jamais sa proie.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

en.X: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
en.Y: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

fr.X: Il cache de la nourriture sous les grands poils de son corps, mais il finit souvent par loublier.
fr.Y: Goinfrex cache de la nourriture dans sa fourrure en pagaille. Il avale tout en une bouchée.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.desc: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
en.Y: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

fr.X: Il communique avec ses semblables grâce à des ondes qui sont modulées en fonction de ses émotions.
fr.Y: Son aura sintensifie pour prévenir son entourage quand il a peur ou quil est triste.
