en.X: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
en.Y: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

fr.X: Il peut deviner les pensées et les mouvements des autres en analysant leur aura.
fr.Y: Il peut sentir et identifier les émotions de quelquun à plus dun kilomètre.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
en.Y: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

fr.X: Il vit dans des endroits arides. Il exsude du sable granuleux au lieu de transpirer.
fr.Y: Il se recouvre de sable pour se protéger des microbes. Il naime pas leau.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
en.Y: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

fr.X: Il exhibe sa force en ouvrant grand sa mâchoire, et attaque en soulevant des tornades de sable.
fr.Y: Il emmagasine du sable quil expulse en tornades par les pores de sa peau pour attaquer.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

hiddenAbilities.name: Keen Eye
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

en.X: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
en.Y: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.

fr.X: Il saisit sa proie avec les pinces de sa queue, lui injecte un poison et la retient jusquà ce quil agisse.
fr.Y: Il attend, en embuscade dans le sable, et empoisonne ses proies avec les pinces de sa queue.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

hiddenAbilities.name: Keen Eye
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

en.X: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
en.Y: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

fr.X: Il met ses adversaires en pièces grâce à sa prodigieuse force, puis donne le coup de grâce avec son violent poison.
fr.Y: Il peut réduire une voiture en pièces avec ses pinces. Le bout de ses pinces contient du poison.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

hiddenAbilities.name: Poison Touch
hiddenAbilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

en.X: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
en.Y: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

fr.X: Ses joues contiennent des glandes toxiques. Il attaque par surprise et utilise son toucher empoisonné.
fr.Y: Ses glandes se gonflent de venin tout en émettant un son effrayant, le laissant ainsi empoisonner ses proies pétrifiées.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

hiddenAbilities.name: Poison Touch
hiddenAbilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

en.X: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
en.Y: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

fr.X: Quand il coasse, le poison stocké sous sa gorge est secoué, le rendant ainsi plus efficace.
fr.Y: Les griffes de ses poings sécrètent une toxine si atroce quune simple égratignure peut savérer fatale.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
en.Y: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

fr.X: Il attire sa proie avec sa salive odorante avant de la croquer. Il lui faut une journée pour lavaler.
fr.Y: Il saccroche aux arbres des marais et attire ses proies avec sa salive à lodeur enivrante.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

en.X: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
en.Y: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

fr.X: La ligne qui fait le tour de son corps stocke lénergie solaire et brille dans la nuit.
fr.Y: Après une longue exposition au soleil, les motifs de ses nageoires caudales luisent à la nuit tombée.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

en.X: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
en.Y: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.

fr.X: Il vit au plus profond de locéan. Il attire sa proie en illuminant les motifs de ses quatre nageoires.
fr.Y: Pour éviter de se faire voir par ses ennemis, il rampe au fond de leau grâce aux nageoires sur son torse.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

en.X: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
en.Y: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.

fr.X: Les motifs sur son dos sont différents selon les régions. On le voit souvent dans des bancs de Rémoraid.
fr.Y: Il nage si proche de la surface que lon peut voir les motifs sur son dos depuis un bateau.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Soundproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

en.X: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
en.Y: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

fr.X: Il saventure jusquau pied des montagnes en hiver, mais se réfugie sur les pics neigeux au printemps.
fr.Y: Au printemps, il fait pousser des Baies pareilles à des crèmes glacées autour de son ventre.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Soundproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

hiddenAbilities.name: Soundproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

en.X: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”
en.Y: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

fr.X: De larges zones sont recouvertes par la neige de ses blizzards. On lappelle «monstre des glaces».
fr.Y: Il hante les sommets aux neiges éternelles, et se cache en déclenchant des blizzards.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Pickpocket
hiddenAbilities.desc: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

en.X: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
en.Y: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

fr.X: Il vit dans les régions enneigées, et communique avec ses pairs en gravant des motifs sur les arbres.
fr.Y: Ils vivent par groupe de 4 ou 5 en région froide et chassent de façon très organisée.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.desc: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
en.Y: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

fr.X: Le champ magnétique quils émettent est tel quils ont tendance à sattirer mutuellement et à sempêcher de bouger.
fr.Y: Il a évolué suite à son exposition à un champ magnétique spécial. Ses 3 unités génèrent du magnétisme.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Cloud Nine
hiddenAbilities.desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

en.X: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
en.Y: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

fr.X: Il enroule tout dans sa langue extensible. Ceux qui lapprochent finissent couverts de bave.
fr.Y: Sa bave anesthésiante est chargée dune substance capable de faire fondre nimporte quelle matière.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.desc: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.

hiddenAbilities.name: Reckless
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

en.X: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
en.Y: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

fr.X: Ses paumes projettent des Racaillou, et son corps couvert de Protecteurs résiste même à une éruption volcanique.
fr.Y: Il bande ses muscles pour projeter des pierres ou des Racaillou depuis le creux de ses paumes.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
en.Y: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can’t even see its eyes.

fr.X: Il ligote sa proie en étirant ses bras en lianes. Il ne craint pas de perdre un bras face à un ennemi.
fr.Y: Lorsque vient la belle saison, ses lianes sont si luxuriantes quelles cachent ses yeux.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Vital Spirit
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
en.Y: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

fr.X: Des étincelles bleuâtres jaillissent entre ses 2 cornes quand il accumule beaucoup délectricité.
fr.Y: Il place le bout de ses deux queues sur son ennemi et libère une décharge de 20000 V.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Vital Spirit
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
en.Y: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

fr.X: Il projette des boules de feu à 2000 °C à bout de bras. Il vit dans les cratères volcaniques.
fr.Y: Il projette des boules de feu à 2000 °C du bout de ses bras. Même son souffle est brûlant.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

hiddenAbilities.name: Super Luck
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

en.X: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
en.Y: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.

fr.X: On dit quil apparaît dans les contrées paisibles pour dispenser mille bienfaits.
fr.Y: Il apprécie particulièrement les gens qui respectent les autres et évitent les conflits inutiles.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.desc: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Frisk
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
en.Y: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

fr.X: Il excelle dans lart de mordre ses ennemis en plein vol, et à grande vitesse.
fr.Y: Il peut voler avec aise tout en portant un adulte dans ses 6 pattes. Les ailes de sa queue lui servent de balancier.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Chlorophyll
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

en.X: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
en.Y: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

fr.X: Un Phyllali qui dort par beau temps produit un air frais et pur par photosynthèse.
fr.Y: Il utilise la photosynthèse comme une plante. Cest pourquoi il est toujours entouré dair pur.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Ice Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

en.X: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
en.Y: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

fr.X: Il ajuste la température de son corps pour créer un vent de glace en gelant lair qui lentoure.
fr.Y: Il abaisse la température de son corps pour changer ses poils en aiguilles de glace quil projette sur lennemi.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Poison Heal
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

en.X: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
en.Y: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.

fr.X: Il guette sa proie, pendu à une branche la tête en bas, et sen saisit à la première occasion.
fr.Y: Il vole sans un bruit, et capture ses proies avec sa queue pour leur infliger une morsure critique.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Thick Fat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

en.X: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
en.Y: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

fr.X: Un Pokémon si vieux quon la découvert sous des glaces vieilles de 10000 ans.
fr.Y: Ses défenses spectaculaires sont glacées. Il a failli disparaître dans la canicule suivant lère glaciaire.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.desc: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.desc: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
en.Y: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...

fr.X: Un logiciel supplémentaire fut installé pour laméliorer. Mais depuis, il se comporte bizarrement.
fr.Y: On a modifié son programme pour quil puisse parcourir les dimensions, mais ce fut un échec.

en.X: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
en.Y: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

fr.X: Comme il peut lire les pensées de ses adversaires, il frappe toujours en premier.
fr.Y: Il frappe avec les grandes lames à ses coudes. Son talent descrimeur na dégal que sa courtoisie.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull

abilities.name: Sturdy

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
en.Y: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

fr.X: Son corps libère une puissante force magnétique. Il dirige trois petites unités appelées Mini-nez.
fr.Y: Il utilise sa force magnétique pour diriger trois petites unités appelées Mini-nez.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Frisk
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

en.X: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
en.Y: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

fr.X: Son corps se replie sur lui-même pour emprisonner les esprits perdus et les ramener chez eux.
fr.Y: Lantenne sur sa tête capte les ondes radio du monde des esprits lui ordonnant dy porter des gens.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Cursed Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

en.X: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
en.Y: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.

fr.X: Momartik gèle ses ennemis grâce à son souffle à -50 °C. Ça ne se voit pas, mais son corps est creux.
fr.Y: On dit dans les régions enneigées quil sagit de la réincarnation dune jeune fille disparue dans les neiges.

abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
en.Y: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

fr.X: Un Pokémon longtemps étudié comme source dénergie pour un moteur très spécial.
fr.Y: Son corps est fait de plasma. Il cause de gros dégâts en infiltrant des appareils électroniques.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.
en.Y: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.

fr.X: On lappelle «être du savoir». On raconte que son regard a le pouvoir deffacer la mémoire.
fr.Y: On dit que sa venue a fourni aux humains le bon sens nécessaire pour améliorer leur existence.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
en.Y: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.

fr.X: On lappelle «être de lémotion». Il enseigne aux hommes la beauté de la tristesse, la douleur et la joie.
fr.Y: Il dort au fond dun lac. On dit que son esprit abandonne son corps pour voler à sa surface.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
en.Y: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.

fr.X: On lappelle «être de la volonté». Il dort au fond dun lac pour maintenir léquilibre du monde.
fr.Y: On raconte que Créhelf, Créfollet et Créfadet proviennent du même uf.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
en.Y: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

fr.X: Les mythes parlent de ce Pokémon. On dit que le temps sest mis en mouvement à sa naissance.
fr.Y: Il peut contrôler le temps. Les mythes de Sinnoh en parlent comme dune divinité ancienne.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.
en.Y: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

fr.X: On dit quil hante une faille dune dimension parallèle à la nôtre. Il apparaît dans la mythologie.
fr.Y: Il peut modeler lespace. Les mythes de Sinnoh en parlent comme dune divinité ancienne.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.desc: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

hiddenAbilities.name: Flame Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

en.X: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
en.Y: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

fr.X: Il hante les grottes volcaniques. Il rampe au mur et au plafond grâce à ses pieds en forme de croix.
fr.Y: Le sang de ce Pokémon des cratères bouillonne dans son corps comme du magma.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.desc: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

en.X: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
en.Y: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

fr.X: On dit quil a créé des Pokémon à son image à partir de glace, de roche et de magma.
fr.Y: Une légende tenace veut que ce Pokémon ait traîné les continents en les attachant à des cordes.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
en.Y: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

fr.X: Il vit dans le Monde Distorsion, un monde à lopposé du nôtre qui échappe au sens commun.
fr.Y: Sa grande violence lui a valu dêtre banni. Il observe les hommes en silence depuis le Monde Distorsion.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
en.Y: Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

fr.X: Ses ailes libèrent un rideau de particules brillantes. Ce Pokémon symboliserait le croissant de lune.
fr.Y: Dormir avec une de ses plumes à la main permet de faire de beaux rêves. On le surnomme «avatar du croissant de lune».

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

en.X: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
en.Y: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

fr.X: Il gonfle la bouée de sa tête et se laisse flotter à la surface quand la mer se réchauffe.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon des mers chaudes revient toujours à son lieu de naissance, peu importe la distance.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

en.X: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
en.Y: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

fr.X: Il est né avec le pouvoir incroyable de créer des liens avec nimporte quel Pokémon.
fr.Y: Il possède létrange pouvoir de sentendre avec nimporte quel Pokémon.

abilities.name: Bad Dreams
abilities.desc: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.

en.X: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
en.Y: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

fr.X: Il endort humains et Pokémon, et leur fait avoir des cauchemars pour les chasser de son territoire.
fr.Y: Il a la capacité de bercer les gens pour les faire rêver. Il se montre durant les nuits de nouvelle lune.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

en.X: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
en.Y: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

fr.X: Il peut dissoudre les toxines dans lair pour transformer un désert en un champ de fleurs luxuriantes.
fr.Y: Il prend son essor pour répandre la gratitude lorsque les Gracidées fleurissent.

abilities.name: Multitype
abilities.desc: Changes type to match the held Plate.

en.X: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
en.Y: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.

fr.X: La mythologie de Sinnoh veut quil soit apparu sous forme duf et ait créé le monde.
fr.Y: Dans la mythologie, ce Pokémon existait déjà avant la formation de lunivers.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.desc: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

en.X: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
en.Y: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.

fr.X: Un Pokémon qui amène la victoire. On dit que les Dresseurs qui le possèdent peuvent gagner nimporte quel combat.
fr.Y: Lénergie sans limites quil produit donne une force incroyable à ceux qui entrent en contact avec elle.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Contrary
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

en.X: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
en.Y: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.

fr.X: La lumière du soleil augmente fortement son agilité. Ses lianes sont plus habiles que ses mains.
fr.Y: Il laisse sa queue prendre le soleil pour sa photosynthèse. Quand il est malade, sa queue pend tristement.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Contrary
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

en.X: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
en.Y: When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

fr.X: Il court comme sil glissait sur le sol. Il déroute lennemi par ses mouvements et lassomme dun coup de liane.
fr.Y: La saleté lempêchant dutiliser la photosynthèse, il prend grand soin dêtre toujours propre.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Contrary
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

en.X: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior’s noble eyes.
en.Y: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

fr.X: Il ne donnera tout son potentiel que contre un ennemi puissant indifférent à son regard écrasant de noblesse.
fr.Y: Il peut paralyser lennemi dun regard. Il amplifie lénergie du soleil dans son corps.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Thick Fat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

en.X: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
en.Y: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

fr.X: Il évite agilement les attaques ennemies et crache des boules de feu par le groin. Il aime griller des Baies pour les manger.
fr.Y: Il adore se goinfrer de Baies grillées, mais il lui arrive de les réduire en cendres dans son excitation.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Thick Fat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

en.X: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
en.Y: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

fr.X: Plus il a mangé de Baies, plus il a de combustible, et il peut donc dégager davantage de flammes et de puissance.
fr.Y: Quand le feu dans son corps sembrase, sa vitesse et son agilité augmentent. En cas durgence, il crache de la fumée.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Reckless
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

en.X: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
en.Y: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.

fr.X: Il embrase ses poings avec les flammes sur son menton et cogne lennemi avec. Cest un Pokémon très solidaire.
fr.Y: Il a une barbe enflammée. Il maîtrise des techniques de combat au corps à corps rapides et puissantes.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shell Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

en.X: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
en.Y: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

fr.X: Le coupillage sur son ventre lui sert non seulement à combattre, mais aussi à trancher les Baies très dures.
fr.Y: Il combat avec le coupillage de son ventre. Il peut parer un assaut et immédiatement contre-attaquer.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shell Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

en.X: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.
en.Y: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.

fr.X: Lapprentissage de sa technique de combat, qui utilise élégamment ses deux coupillages, est extrêmement rigoureux.
fr.Y: Chaque Mateloutre a sa propre technique descrime au coupillage, acquise grâce à un entraînement drastique.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shell Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

en.X: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
en.Y: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

fr.X: Il dissimule de grandes lames quil dégaine en un éclair des fourreaux de ses pattes antérieures.
fr.Y: Il peut terrasser ses ennemis dun coup de la lame enchâssée dans son armure, et les faire taire dun seul regard.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
en.Y: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.

fr.X: Ils stockent à manger dans leurs bajoues et font le guet indéfiniment. Ils se font des signes en remuant la queue.
fr.Y: Très prudent, il surveille attentivement son territoire, mais oublie souvent de regarder derrière lui.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
en.Y: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

fr.X: Il intimide lennemi en faisant briller son pelage et ses yeux grâce à une substance à lintérieur de son corps.
fr.Y: Il attaque en crachant les graines des Baies quil accumule dans ses bajoues. Sil voit un ennemi, il dresse la queue.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

hiddenAbilities.name: Run Away
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

en.X: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
en.Y: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.

fr.X: Les longs poils de son museau font un excellent radar qui analyse les alentours avec une grande acuité.
fr.Y: Bien que vaillant, il a aussi lintelligence danalyser toutes les situations et de fuir quand il anticipe une défaite.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
en.Y: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

fr.X: Un Pokémon très loyal qui aide aussi bien les Dresseurs que les autres Pokémon quil rencontre.
fr.Y: Les poils qui entourent son corps comme un manteau sont extrêmement durs et amortissent les coups.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
en.Y: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.

fr.X: Il sauve les gens bloqués dans les montagnes par des tempêtes de neige. Ses longs poils le protègent du froid.
fr.Y: Sa soyeuse fourrure à poils longs est assez chaude pour supporter de longues nuits dhiver en montagne.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
en.Y: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

fr.X: Il détourne lattention de ses victimes avec ses gestes mignons pour mieux les détrousser. En colère, il griffe.
fr.Y: Il vole les gens pour le plaisir, mais il est tellement mignon que ses victimes finissent toujours par lui pardonner.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
en.Y: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.

fr.X: Sa ligne élégante cache une musculature féline qui lui permet de surprendre lors de ses attaques nocturnes.
fr.Y: Il sapproche sans un bruit de sa proie et labat dun coup par-derrière sans jamais être repéré.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overgrow
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
en.Y: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.

fr.X: Les feuilles qui poussent sur sa tête soignent la fatigue. Il en donne aux Pokémon affaiblis.
fr.Y: Il est très doué pour trouver des Baies et aime les partager avec ses amis sans rien demander en échange.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overgrow
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
en.Y: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

fr.X: Il frappe ses ennemis avec sa queue couverte de pointes. Un Pokémon au caractère agressif.
fr.Y: Il a un tempérament violent et se bat avec sa queue pleine dépines. La feuille sur sa tête est très amère.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Blaze
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
en.Y: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

fr.X: Un Pokémon très intelligent qui adore cuire ses Baies avant de les manger. Il aime aussi aider les humains.
fr.Y: Il vit dans les cratères des volcans. Lintérieur de la mèche quil a sur la tête peut atteindre 300 °C.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Blaze
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
en.Y: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

fr.X: Son corps est en combustion. Il projette des flammèches par la tête et la queue pour carboniser ses ennemis.
fr.Y: Quand il est excité, des flammèches brûlantes dansent sur sa tête et sa queue. Il raffole des choses sucrées.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Torrent
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
en.Y: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

fr.X: Sa houppette est chargée deau et de nutriments. Il nourrit les plantes et les arbres avec sa queue.
fr.Y: Leau contenue dans la mèche sur sa tête est pleine de nutriments. Elle fait pousser les plantes avec vigueur.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

hiddenAbilities.name: Torrent
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
en.Y: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

fr.X: Le jet deau à haute pression quil propulse par la queue est assez puissant pour traverser un mur de béton.
fr.Y: Il aime les endroits où leau est pure. Il se ravitaille en eau en laspirant avec sa queue.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.desc: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
en.Y: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.

fr.X: Il apparaît aux humains et aux Pokémon qui font des mauvais rêves et mange leurs cauchemars pour les en libérer.
fr.Y: Il se nourrit des rêves des gens et des Pokémon. Quand le rêve est agréable, il crache une fumée rose.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.desc: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Synchronize

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
en.Y: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.

fr.X: La fumée qui sort de son front contient les rêves de nombreuses personnes et ceux de nombreux Pokémon.
fr.Y: La fumée qui sort de son front change de couleur selon le contenu des rêves quil a mangés.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rivalry
hiddenAbilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

en.X: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
en.Y: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

fr.X: Un Pokémon très distrait qui oublie les ordres de son Dresseur et reste planté à en attendre de nouveaux.
fr.Y: Ces Pokémon vivent en ville. Ils sont peu farouches et se regroupent souvent dans les parcs ou sur les places.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rivalry
hiddenAbilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

en.X: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
en.Y: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

fr.X: On dit que tout au fond de la forêt où il vit, il y aurait un pays paisible qui na jamais connu la guerre.
fr.Y: Quel que soit le lieu où il se trouve, il arrive toujours à retrouver son Dresseur comme son propre nid.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rivalry
hiddenAbilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

en.X: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
en.Y: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

fr.X: Le mâle intimide ses ennemis avec ses caroncules. La femelle vole mieux que le mâle.
fr.Y: Ils sont très farouches et ne sattachent quà leur Dresseur. Les mâles ont une parure sur la tête.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
en.Y: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

fr.X: Il apparaît quand le ciel est à lorage. Il capte les éclairs avec sa crinière et accumule de lélectricité.
fr.Y: Sa crinière luit quand il lâche des décharges. Il module leur rythme et leur nombre pour communiquer avec ses pairs.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sap Sipper
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

en.X: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
en.Y: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

fr.X: De caractère violent, il envoie avec sa crinière des arcs électriques de tous les côtés lorsquil se sent provoqué.
fr.Y: Il réagit à la vitesse de léclair. Lorsquil est en plein galop, on peut entendre le grondement du tonnerre.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
en.Y: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.

fr.X: Il a une oreille hexagonale. Son corps, compressé dans des strates profondes, est dur comme de lacier.
fr.Y: On la découvert dans une fissure après un grand tremblement de terre il y a 100 ans. Il possède un noyau dénergie.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
en.Y: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.

fr.X: Lénergie de son corps quil ne parvient pas à retenir sécoule à lextérieur et forme des cristaux orangés.
fr.Y: Quand il est en forme, son noyau devient visible. Il peut se déplacer dans toutes les directions sans se tourner.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Force
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

en.X: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
en.Y: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

fr.X: Il amplifie dans son noyau lénergie du soleil absorbée par son corps et la projette en une boule de lumière.
fr.Y: Il comprime de lénergie dans son corps, et ses attaques sont assez puissantes pour renverser des montagnes.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.desc: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Simple
hiddenAbilities.desc: Doubles all stat changes.

en.X: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
en.Y: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.

fr.X: Il vit dans les forêts sombres et les grottes. Il émet des ultrasons par le nez pour se diriger.
fr.Y: Son nez est comme une ventouse. Il laisse une marque en forme de cur qui, paraît-il, porte bonheur.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.desc: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Simple
hiddenAbilities.desc: Doubles all stat changes.

en.X: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
en.Y: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.

fr.X: Sa queue sagite frénétiquement quand il émet ses ultrasons assez puissants pour pulvériser du béton.
fr.Y: Le mâle courtise la femelle à laide dultrasons. Les écouter met de très bonne humeur.

abilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Mold Breaker
hiddenAbilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

en.X: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
en.Y: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

fr.X: Il se propulse à grande vitesse sous la terre en joignant ses griffes et en tourbillonnant sur lui-même.
fr.Y: Il tourbillonne sur lui-même pour se déplacer sous terre. Il peut atteindre les 50 km/h en ligne droite.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Mold Breaker
hiddenAbilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

en.X: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
en.Y: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

fr.X: Ses vrilles en acier peuvent transpercer des poutres en fer. Il est très employé dans la construction de tunnels.
fr.Y: Il se creuse des terriers labyrinthiques à 100 m sous terre. Il lui arrive de percer les galeries du métro.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
en.Y: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

fr.X: Son ouïe est si développée quil arrive à juger de la santé des gens ou à savoir quand un uf va éclore.
fr.Y: Il ausculte les gens avec ses antennes auriculaires pour juger de leurs émotions ou de leur santé.

en.X: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
en.Y: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

fr.X: Il porte toujours une poutre. Il apparaît sur les chantiers pour aider aux travaux.
fr.Y: Il porte toujours une poutre en bois et aime aider aux travaux. Il passe à un lourd madrier quand il grandit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Iron Fist
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

en.X: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
en.Y: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon hyper musclé manipule avec habileté les poutres métalliques et peut démanteler un immeuble en un clin dil.
fr.Y: Même une armée de catcheurs se jetant sur son corps hyper musclé ne le ferait pas ciller.

en.X: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
en.Y: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

fr.X: On pense que la recette du ciment a été enseignée aux humains par un Bétochef il y a 2000 ans.
fr.Y: Il utilise leffet centrifuge pour manier sans trop deffort ses piliers de béton et déclencher des attaques puissantes.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
en.Y: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.

fr.X: Il fait vibrer ses joues pour émettre des sons inaudibles pour les humains et alerter ses semblables des dangers.
fr.Y: Il fait vibrer ses joues pour émettre des sons imperceptibles pour lhomme. Il communique grâce à leur rythme.

abilities.name: Hydration

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
en.Y: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.

fr.X: Quand il fait vibrer la bosse sur sa tête, il provoque des ondulations dans leau, mais aussi des tremblements de terre.
fr.Y: Il vit dans leau et sur la terre ferme. Il immobilise ses proies avec sa langue longue et gluante.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

hiddenAbilities.name: Water Absorb
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

en.X: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
en.Y: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

fr.X: Son coup de poing est plus fort quand il fait vibrer la pustule dessus. Il peut briser un gros rocher dun coup.
fr.Y: Il fait gicler un liquide paralysant des pustules sur sa tête, et attaque ses ennemis à coups de vibrations.

abilities.name: Guts

en.X: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
en.Y: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

fr.X: Quand il noue sa ceinture, il devient plus puissant. Les Judokrak sauvages tressent leur ceinture avec des lianes.
fr.Y: Ils aiment projeter ceux qui sont plus grands queux. Ils changent de ceinture quand ils progressent.

abilities.name: Inner Focus

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Mold Breaker
hiddenAbilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

en.X: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
en.Y: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

fr.X: Pour accéder à la maîtrise ultime du karaté, il se retire dans les montagnes et sentraîne nuit et jour.
fr.Y: Quand il noue sa ceinture, il est plus concentré et ses coups font plus mal. Il sénerve si on gêne son entraînement.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
en.Y: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

fr.X: Il fait des vêtements en découpant des feuilles et en les cousant avec le fil adhésif quil sécrète par la bouche.
fr.Y: La mascotte des créateurs de mode. Il découpe ses vêtements dans les feuilles quil trouve.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
en.Y: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

fr.X: Dans les forêts où il vit, la végétation pousse bien car il transforme les feuilles mortes en engrais.
fr.Y: Il se protège du froid en semmitouflant dans une feuille. Il se déplace en forêt et mange les feuilles tombées par terre.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
en.Y: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

fr.X: Il fabrique des vêtements de feuilles pour les Pokémon encore jeunes grâce à son fil de soie adhésif.
fr.Y: Il réchauffe les ufs avec la chaleur de lhumus. Il fabrique des langes pour les Larveyette avec des feuilles.

abilities.name: Poison Point

en.X: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
en.Y: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

fr.X: Il sonde les alentours avec les antennes sur sa tête et sa queue. Il est extrêmement brutal.
fr.Y: Sa morsure est très venimeuse. Elle paralyse même les grands Pokémon Oiseaux, ses prédateurs.

abilities.name: Poison Point

en.X: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
en.Y: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

fr.X: Protégé par sa solide carapace, il fonce sur ses ennemis en roulant comme un pneu.
fr.Y: En général, il reste immobile. Mais quand on lattaque, il se met à tourbillonner à toute vitesse et fonce sur lennemi.

en.X: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
en.Y: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

fr.X: Il paralyse lennemi avec les griffes de son cou avant de mettre fin au combat grâce à son poison virulent.
fr.Y: Il accule lennemi par ses mouvements rapides et lattaque avec ses cornes. Il ne sarrête quau coup de grâce.

abilities.name: Infiltrator

abilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
en.Y: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

fr.X: Si on lattaque, il projette un nuage de coton. Lennemi le confond avec lui, ce qui permet à Doudouvet de senfuir.
fr.Y: Pokémon à linstinct grégaire, ils se collent les uns aux autres et finissent par former un gros nuage.

en.X: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
en.Y: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

fr.X: Il apparaît dans un tourbillon de vent, sintroduit dans les maisons et y joue de mauvais tours.
fr.Y: Il se faufile comme le vent par les espaces les plus étroits, en laissant une touffe de poils blancs.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Leaf Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

en.X: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
en.Y: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.

fr.X: Les feuilles sur sa tête sont très amères, mais elles remettent daplomb les corps les plus éreintés.
fr.Y: Il aime les zones bien irriguées et riches en nutriments. On sait que là où il vit, les cultures sont florissantes.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Leaf Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

en.X: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
en.Y: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

fr.X: La fleur sur sa tête a des propriétés relaxantes. Elle se fane si on ne sen occupe pas avec attention.
fr.Y: Même les Dresseurs confirmés ont du mal à faire éclore sa belle fleur. Un Pokémon apprécié des célébrités.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.desc: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

hiddenAbilities.name: Mold Breaker
hiddenAbilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

en.X: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
en.Y: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other’s school.

fr.X: Les rouges et les bleus se détestent et se battent dès quils saperçoivent. Un Pokémon violent mais délicieux.
fr.Y: Les rouges et les bleus se détestent, mais il y en a toujours un ou deux dans un groupe de lautre couleur.

abilities.name: Intimidate

hiddenAbilities.name: Anger Point
hiddenAbilities.desc: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

en.X: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
en.Y: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

fr.X: Il se déplace dans le sable en gardant le nez et les yeux à découvert. La membrane noire protège ses yeux.
fr.Y: Il vit dans le sable des déserts. Le sable chauffé par le soleil empêche son corps de refroidir.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Anger Point
hiddenAbilities.desc: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

en.X: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
en.Y: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.

fr.X: Ils vivent en petits groupes. La membrane qui couvre leurs yeux les protège du soleil.
fr.Y: La membrane spéciale qui recouvre ses yeux détecte la chaleur et lui permet de voir dans le noir.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

hiddenAbilities.name: Anger Point
hiddenAbilities.desc: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

en.X: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
en.Y: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

fr.X: Un Pokémon extrêmement violent qui broie tout ce qui lui passe sous les yeux avec ses mâchoires.
fr.Y: Il ne laisse jamais échapper ses proies. Ses mâchoires surpuissantes peuvent broyer une voiture.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Inner Focus
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

en.X: Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
en.Y: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

fr.X: Les gens dautrefois avaient lhabitude de mettre ses crottes brûlantes sous leurs vêtements pour se réchauffer.
fr.Y: Quand il dort, ses pattes se rétractent et les flammes qui brûlent à 600 °C dans son corps sapaisent.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is halved.

hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is halved.

en.X: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
en.Y: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

fr.X: Sil est blessé dans un combat, il se fige comme un rocher, fait le vide dans son esprit et aiguise ses sens.
fr.Y: Il entretient des flammes à 1400 °C dans son corps. De quoi détruire un camion-benne dun coup de poing !

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

hiddenAbilities.name: Storm Drain
hiddenAbilities.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

en.X: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
en.Y: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.

fr.X: Avec une danse et des sons saccadés, il fait fuir ses prédateurs, les Pokémon Oiseaux dévoreurs de graines de fleur.
fr.Y: Il vit dans les endroits secs. Quand il bouge son corps en rythme, il fait un bruit de maracas.

hiddenAbilities.name: Weak Armor

en.X: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
en.Y: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.

fr.X: Il perce un caillou et sen sert comme maison. Quand on lui casse, il est anxieux jusquà ce quil en trouve un autre.
fr.Y: Lorsquil trouve un caillou à sa taille, il y creuse un trou avec le fluide qui sort de sa bouche et sen sert comme maison.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
