hiddenAbilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

en.X: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
en.Y: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

fr.X: Il est assez endurant pour voyager des jours durant dans des zones desséchées avec son lourd rocher sur le dos.
fr.Y: Entre eux, les querelles de territoire sont fréquentes et violentes. Celui qui se fait briser son rocher a perdu.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

hiddenAbilities.name: Intimidate
hiddenAbilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

en.X: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
en.Y: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.

fr.X: Il remonte sa peau jusquà son cou pour se protéger. Elle a une constitution élastique qui absorbe les coups.
fr.Y: Ses coups de tête sont sa fierté. Seul problème : sa tête est un peu trop lourde, et il perd souvent léquilibre.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

hiddenAbilities.name: Intimidate
hiddenAbilities.desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

en.X: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
en.Y: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

fr.X: Son baggy de peau le protège quand il donne des coups de pied. Les meneurs sont ceux qui ont la plus grande crête.
fr.Y: La plus grande crête détermine le meneur du groupe. Il détruit des blocs de béton à coups de pied.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.desc: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

hiddenAbilities.name: Tinted Lens
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

en.X: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
en.Y: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

fr.X: Il était le dieu protecteur dune ville antique. Il repoussait les envahisseurs à coups de pouvoir psychique.
fr.Y: Dieu protecteur dune ville antique, il suivait toujours le même itinéraire afin de prévenir tout risque dinvasion.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.desc: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

en.X: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
en.Y: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

fr.X: Il est né de lâme dun défunt inhumé dans une tombe antique. Il a conservé ses anciens souvenirs.
fr.Y: Le motif de son masque est son visage quand il était humain. Parfois, il le regarde et se met à pleurer.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.desc: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

en.X: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
en.Y: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

fr.X: Il paraît quil avale les gens et les transforme en momies. Il adore manger des lingots dor.
fr.Y: Il prend lapparence dun beau cercueil. Les pilleurs de tombes imprudents finissent enfermés à lintérieur.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.desc: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swift Swim
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

en.X: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
en.Y: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

fr.X: Il nageait dans les océans il y a 100 millions dannées. Il lui arrive de rallier la terre ferme pour attaquer ses proies.
fr.Y: Il a été recréé à partir dun fossile préhistorique. Il peut plonger jusquà 1000 mètres de profondeur.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.desc: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swift Swim
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

en.X: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
en.Y: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.

fr.X: Il vit sur terre et en mer. Ses bras surpuissants peuvent percer des trous dans la coque des paquebots.
fr.Y: Ses bras puissants serrent ses proies jusquà lévanouissement. Il les dévore ensuite, carapace et os compris.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.desc: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

en.X: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
en.Y: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

fr.X: Un Pokémon recréé à partir dun fossile. On pense quil est lancêtre de tous les Pokémon Oiseaux.
fr.Y: On dit quil serait lancêtre de tous les Pokémon Oiseaux. Il ne sait pas voler et se déplace en sautant darbre en arbre.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.desc: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

en.X: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
en.Y: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.

fr.X: Il senvole après avoir pris de lélan. Il est assez intelligent pour chasser ses proies en groupe.
fr.Y: Il est plus doué pour courir que pour voler. Il doit sélancer à 40 km/h avant de pouvoir senvoler.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.desc: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

hiddenAbilities.name: Aftermath
hiddenAbilities.desc: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

en.X: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
en.Y: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

fr.X: Il est né de la mutation dun sac poubelle contenant des déchets industriels.
fr.Y: Il aime les endroits mal tenus. Le gaz quil rote endort pendant une semaine.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.desc: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

hiddenAbilities.name: Aftermath
hiddenAbilities.desc: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

en.X: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
en.Y: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

fr.X: Il étrangle ses ennemis avec son bras gauche et les achève avec le gaz puant et empoisonné quil exhale par la bouche.
fr.Y: Il aspire les déchets et les intègre à son corps pour produire des gaz et des fluides toxiques.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.desc: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

en.X: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
en.Y: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

fr.X: Il prend lapparence de son adversaire pour le désorienter et prendre la fuite grâce à la confusion causée.
fr.Y: Il peut se transformer en humain ou en dautres Pokémon. Il se protège du danger en dissimulant sa vraie identité.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.desc: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

en.X: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
en.Y: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

fr.X: Il peut mystifier instantanément des foules dhumains. Il protège son habitat en créant des illusions de paysages.
fr.Y: Ces Pokémon protègent les leurs en prenant lapparence de leurs ennemis. Ils forment des groupes très soudés.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Skill Link
hiddenAbilities.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

en.X: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
en.Y: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

fr.X: Ils se saluent en sépoussetant les uns les autres avec leur queue qui leur sert de plumeau.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon qui aime la propreté. Chez lui, il enlève sans cesse la poussière en utilisant sa queue comme un plumeau.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Skill Link
hiddenAbilities.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

en.X: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
en.Y: Cinccino’s body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

fr.X: La texture de ses poils blancs est incomparable. Elle nattire ni la poussière, ni lélectricité statique.
fr.Y: Son corps est recouvert dune sorte de lubrifiant qui fait glisser les coups sur lui comme si de rien nétait.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.desc: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shadow Tag
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

en.X: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
en.Y: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

fr.X: Concentre des pouvoirs psychiques dans ses antennes semblables à des rubans, et regarde fixement mais quoi
fr.Y: Fixe les Pokémon et les Dresseurs du regard comme sil y avait quelque chose que personne dautre ne pouvait voir.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.desc: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shadow Tag
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

en.X: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
en.Y: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

fr.X: Tire son énergie de la lumière des étoiles et marque leur position en faisant léviter des pierres la nuit.
fr.Y: On dit quils apparaissent les nuits étoilées et manipulent les enfants pour jouer avec eux.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.desc: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shadow Tag
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

en.X: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
en.Y: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers’ life spans.

fr.X: Ses pouvoirs psychiques plient lespace aux alentours. On y voit des étoiles éloignées de millions dannées-lumière.
fr.Y: Prédit lavenir à partir de la position et du mouvement des étoiles. Perçoit aussi lespérance de vie des Dresseurs.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
en.Y: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

fr.X: Son corps est enrobé dans un fluide spécial, ce qui lui permet de vivre dans nimporte quel environnement.
fr.Y: Ils repoussent leurs assaillants avec leurs pouvoirs psychiques et communiquent entre eux par télépathie.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
en.Y: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

fr.X: Il possède deux cerveaux séparés qui le font parfois agir de façon totalement incohérente.
fr.Y: Il dégage le maximum de sa puissance psychique quand ses deux cerveaux réfléchissent à la même chose.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
en.Y: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

fr.X: Ses bras, faits dune matière conduisant ses pouvoirs psychiques, sont assez puissants pour broyer des rochers.
fr.Y: Quand ils se tiennent par la main, leurs cerveaux forment un réseau qui démultiplie leurs pouvoirs psychiques.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Hydration
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

en.X: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
en.Y: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

fr.X: Quand on lattaque, il sébroue et fait jaillir de la vapeur deau de tout son corps. Il se cache dedans pour senfuir.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon doué pour la plongée qui passe son temps sous leau à chercher des sphaignes, son plat préféré.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Hydration
hiddenAbilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

en.X: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
en.Y: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

fr.X: Un Pokémon gracieux, mais aussi robuste. Il peut voler des milliers de kilomètres grâce à ses ailes puissantes.
fr.Y: Ils se mettent à danser à la tombée de la nuit. Le Lakmécygne qui danse au centre est le chef de la troupe.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Weak Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

en.X: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
en.Y: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

fr.X: Il exhale une haleine à -50 °C. Il fabrique des cristaux de neige et fait neiger autour de lui.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon est né dun glaçon qui a baigné dans la lumière du matin. Il se cache dans la neige pour dormir.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Weak Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

en.X: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
en.Y: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

fr.X: Il pétrifie ses ennemis en refroidissant lair ambiant et en le changeant en une myriade de petites particules de glace.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon qui vit dans les montagnes enneigées. Il a émigré au sud durant lère glaciaire, il y a bien longtemps.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Weak Armor
hiddenAbilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

en.X: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
en.Y: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

fr.X: Quand ses deux têtes se fâchent en même temps, il émet un blizzard de ses cornes et enfouit les alentours sous la neige.
fr.Y: Il avale de grandes quantités deau et la transforme en nuages de neige. Il souffle du blizzard quand il se fâche.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Serene Grace
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

en.X: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
en.Y: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

fr.X: Son pelage change selon la saison, et dans une moindre mesure en fonction de lhumidité et de la température.
fr.Y: Quand la saison change, il change de pelage et dodeur. Un Pokémon qui annonce le passage des saisons.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Serene Grace
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

en.X: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
en.Y: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

fr.X: Il change dhabitat selon les saisons. Les gens constatent le passage des saisons en regardant ses ramures.
fr.Y: Il change dhabitat selon les saisons. Certains disent même quil est celui qui apporte le printemps.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.name: Motor Drive
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

en.X: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
en.Y: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

fr.X: Il vit au sommet des arbres de la forêt. Il plane en déchargeant lélectricité de ses membranes semblables à une cape.
fr.Y: Il accumule dans ses membranes lélectricité quil produit dans ses bajoues, et la relâche tout en planant.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: No Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

en.X: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
en.Y: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

fr.X: Un Pokémon mystérieux qui évolue quand il reçoit un stimulus électrique en étant proche dun Escargaume.
fr.Y: Pour une raison inconnue, ce Pokémon évolue sil subit une décharge électrique pendant quil attaque un Escargaume.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
en.Y: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon se protège avec la carapace dérobée à un Escargaume et attaque avec ses deux redoutables lances.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon qui a évolué en portant la carapace dun Escargaume. Une armure de fer protège tout son corps.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.desc: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
en.Y: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.

fr.X: Grâce à sa ressemblance mystérieuse avec une Poké Ball, il attire ses ennemis et relâche des spores empoisonnées.
fr.Y: Son apparence de Poké Ball trompe ses ennemis, quil étourdit à laide de ses spores empoisonnées.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.desc: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
en.Y: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

fr.X: Il se sert de ses coupoles en forme de Poké Ball pour attirer ses proies, mais peu de Pokémon se laissent avoir.
fr.Y: Il danse en faisant tournoyer les coupoles en forme de Poké Ball de ses bras pour attirer ses proies.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.desc: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Damp
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

en.X: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
en.Y: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.

fr.X: Il paralyse ses proies avec du poison et les entraîne jusquà son antre, quon dit situé à 8000 m de profondeur.
fr.Y: Il enserre ses proies dans ses voiles et les entraîne sous la surface de la mer jusquà plus de 8000 m de profondeur.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.desc: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Damp
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

en.X: Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
en.Y: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

fr.X: Il est presque entièrement fait deau de mer. On dit quil vit dans un palais fait des épaves des bateaux quil a coulés.
fr.Y: Les bateaux qui saventurent sur son territoire coulent, et Moyade aspire lénergie vitale des marins.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hiddenAbilities.name: Regenerator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
en.Y: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

fr.X: Il vit en dérivant dans les grands océans. Quand il trouve des Pokémon blessés, il les ramène jusquà la côte.
fr.Y: Il berce les Pokémon blessés dans ses nageoires et les guérit grâce à la membrane dont il est recouvert.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swarm
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.
en.Y: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

fr.X: Ne produisant pas lui-même délectricité, il saccroche aux Pokémon plus grands et aspire leur électricité statique.
fr.Y: Il saccroche aux Pokémon plus grands et aspire leur électricité statique. Il la stocke dans ses poches-accus.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swarm
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

en.X: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
en.Y: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

fr.X: Il tend des pièges avec ses fils électriques. Il déguste tranquillement ses proies une fois électrocutées.
fr.Y: Quand on lattaque, il projette une multitude de fils électrifiés pour créer une barrière électrique.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.desc: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

hiddenAbilities.name: Anticipation
hiddenAbilities.desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

en.X: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
en.Y: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

fr.X: Quand il sent un danger, il réagit en projetant toutes ses épines dun coup et senfuit en roulant sur lui-même.
fr.Y: Il saccroche aux parois des grottes et en absorbe les minéraux. Il projette ses épines en cas de danger.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.desc: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

hiddenAbilities.name: Anticipation
hiddenAbilities.desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

en.X: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
en.Y: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

fr.X: Il attaque grâce à ses trois tentacules épineux et lance des épines dacier pour réduire ses ennemis en poussière.
fr.Y: Il saccroche aux plafonds des grottes et attaque les proies qui passent en dessous avec ses épines dacier.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

hiddenAbilities.name: Clear Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

en.X: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
en.Y: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

fr.X: Le mouvement de ses deux corps enchâssés produit lénergie qui lui est nécessaire pour vivre.
fr.Y: La compatibilité entre ses deux rouages est prédéterminée. Ceux-ci ne se fixeront à aucun autre.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

hiddenAbilities.name: Clear Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

en.X: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
en.Y: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn’t return, it will die.

fr.X: Ils communiquent entre eux en changeant leur sens de rotation. Plus ils sont en colère, plus ils tournent vite.
fr.Y: Le plus grand des rouages projette le plus petit pour attaquer. Ce dernier risque de dépérir sil ne revient pas.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

hiddenAbilities.name: Clear Body
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

en.X: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
en.Y: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

fr.X: Il accumule rapidement de lénergie en faisant tourner très vite le rouage qui contient son noyau rouge.
fr.Y: Son noyau rouge lui permet daccumuler de lénergie quil projette ensuite aux alentours grâce à ses pics.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
en.Y: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

fr.X: Tout seuls, ils ne dégagent pas beaucoup délectricité, mais un banc dAnchwatt produit la même puissance quun éclair.
fr.Y: Tout seul, il ne dégage pas beaucoup délectricité. Mais un banc dAnchwatt produit des décharges surpuissantes.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
en.Y: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

fr.X: Ses taches émettent de lélectricité quand il senroule autour de ses proies pour les paralyser avant de les dévorer.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon doté dun gros appétit. Il paralyse ses proies avec des décharges électriques avant de les manger.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
en.Y: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

fr.X: Il sattache à ses proies avec sa bouche-ventouse et les électrocute avec ses crocs.
fr.Y: Il peut sortir de leau à la force de ses bras pour attraper des proies sur la rive. Il retourne à leau en un instant.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.
en.Y: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

fr.X: Avec son puissant pouvoir psychique, il peut compresser le cerveau de ses ennemis et déclencher des migraines.
fr.Y: On dit quil est apparu soudainement il y a 50 ans des confins dun désert où un OVNI se serait écrasé.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

hiddenAbilities.name: Analytic
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

en.X: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.
en.Y: It uses psychic power to control an opponent’s brain and tamper with its memories.

fr.X: Il fait clignoter ses doigts tricolores pour communiquer avec ses semblables. Son langage reste un mystère.
fr.Y: Il manipule lesprit avec ses pouvoirs psychiques et peut modifier les images conservées dans les souvenirs.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.desc: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

hiddenAbilities.name: Shadow Tag
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

en.X: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
en.Y: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

fr.X: Il fait semblant de guider ses victimes à la lueur de sa flamme, mais cest pour mieux aspirer leur énergie vitale.
fr.Y: Sa flamme brûle en consumant lénergie vitale des gens et des Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flash Fire

en.X: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
en.Y: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

fr.X: Il aspire les âmes pour entretenir sa flamme. Il erre dans les hôpitaux dans lattente dun trépas.
fr.Y: Il apparaît au moment du trépas et aspire lâme à linstant même où elle quitte le corps.

en.X: Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
en.Y: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

fr.X: Les victimes des flammes de Lugulabre voient leur âme aspirée jusquà ce que leur corps ne soit plus que coquille vide.
fr.Y: Les âmes consumées par ses flammes étranges sont condamnées à lerrance pour léternité.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
en.Y: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

fr.X: Il broie les Baies à grands coups de crocs. Ceux-ci repoussent plusieurs fois, toujours plus forts et aiguisés.
fr.Y: Il laisse la marque de ses crocs dans les arbres pour marquer son territoire. Ses crocs repoussent dès quils tombent.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
en.Y: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

fr.X: Leurs crocs peuvent découper des rochers. Leurs querelles de territoire sont extrêmement violentes.
fr.Y: Comme ses crocs brisés ne repoussent pas, il les aiguise avec soin après le combat sur les pierres des rivières.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unnerve
hiddenAbilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

en.X: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
en.Y: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.

fr.X: Il est doux, mais ne pardonne pas à ceux qui viennent saccager son territoire. Ses crocs peuvent découper de lacier.
fr.Y: Ses crocs sont tellement puissants quils peuvent découper lacier sans sémousser. Son armure est très solide.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rattled
hiddenAbilities.desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

en.X: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
en.Y: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

fr.X: Il a toujours la goutte au nez. Il laspire pour déclencher ses capacités. La morve en est la matière première.
fr.Y: Sa roupie indique sa santé. Sil est en forme, elle sera épaisse et la puissance de ses attaques glacées augmentera.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Swift Swim
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

en.X: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
en.Y: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

fr.X: Il aime les mers glaciales du nord. Il y trace son chemin en créant des îlots de glace pour éviter de nager.
fr.Y: Il gèle son haleine et en fait des crocs et des griffes de glace pour combattre. Il vit dans les terres gelées du nord.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

en.X: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
en.Y: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.

fr.X: Né dun nuage neigeux, il attrape ses proies à laide de sa chaîne faite de cristaux de givre.
fr.Y: Il attrape ses proies à laide de sa chaîne faite de cristaux de givre et les gèle à près de -100 °C.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

hiddenAbilities.name: Overcoat
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

en.X: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
en.Y: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

fr.X: Sil est à proximité dun Carabing et que les deux reçoivent une décharge électrique, ils évoluent en même temps.
fr.Y: Il évolue quand il baigne dans une énergie électrique avec un Carabing. La cause en est inconnue.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unburden
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

en.X: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
en.Y: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

fr.X: Il sest bien allégé en se débarrassant de sa lourde carapace. Il se bat avec lagilité dun ninja.
fr.Y: Quand son corps sassèche, il faiblit. Il sen prémunit en senroulant dans plusieurs couches dune fine muqueuse.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sand Veil

en.X: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
en.Y: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.

fr.X: Sa peau est si dure quil peut se faire piétiner par un sumo sans rien sentir. Il sourit en émettant de lélectricité.
fr.Y: Tapi dans la boue ou les sédiments, il attend sa proie patiemment et la paralyse avec une décharge électrique.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

en.X: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
en.Y: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

fr.X: Il se flatte dêtre très rapide. Pour compenser la faiblesse de ses coups, il en assène un très grand nombre.
fr.Y: Il découpe ses ennemis avec ses griffes acérées et les terrasse avec ses enchaînements de coups hyper fluides.

en.X: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
en.Y: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.

fr.X: Il se sert des poils de ses pattes antérieures comme de fouets. Ses coups ultrarapides sont invisibles à lil nu.
fr.Y: Il combat à laide des longs poils de ses pattes antérieures. Une fois lancé dans ses enchaînements, rien ne larrête.

en.X: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
en.Y: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

fr.X: Il sillonne les grottes étroites, capturant ses proies avec ses griffes acérées. Sa face est dure comme le roc.
fr.Y: Il utilise ses ailes pour emmagasiner la chaleur du soleil. Si la température de son corps baisse, il ne peut plus bouger.

en.Y: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It’s been active for thousands of years.

fr.X: Il se meut grâce à lénergie stockée dans son corps. Personne ne sait doù vient cette énergie mystérieuse.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon fait de terre glaise, produit de la technologie dune civilisation antique, vit depuis des millénaires.

en.X: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
en.Y: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

fr.X: Ses créateurs dune lointaine époque lui auraient ordonné de protéger les humains et les Pokémon.
fr.Y: Il vole à la vitesse du son. Si le sceau sur sa poitrine est retiré, il perd tout contrôle de lui-même.

en.Y: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

fr.X: Tout son corps est fait de lames. Si une lame sémousse, il va laiguiser contre une pierre au bord dune rivière.
fr.Y: Ignorant leurs propres blessures, ils se jettent en groupe sur lennemi pour le déchirer de leur corps fait de lames.

en.Y: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.

fr.X: Un Pokémon sans pitié qui tranche en deux ses proies immobilisées par les cohortes de Scalpion quil commande.
fr.Y: Il chasse avec un groupe de Scalpion sous ses ordres, mais cest lui qui donne le coup de grâce.

en.X: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
en.Y: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

fr.X: Il charge tout ce qui bouge sans réfléchir. Il peut faire dérailler un train en marche.
fr.Y: Son pelage fourni absorbe les chocs et lui permet dasséner sans broncher le plus violent des coups de tête.

en.X: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
en.Y: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

fr.X: Il casse les Baies avec ses serres. Il combat courageusement, quelle que soit la force de ladversaire.
fr.Y: Il défie sans discernement même les ennemis puissants. Il devient plus fort en multipliant les combats.

en.Y: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

fr.X: Un chevalier du ciel, brave et intrépide. Pour les siens, il combat au mépris du danger, sans jamais fléchir.
fr.Y: Pour les siens, il combat au mépris du danger. Il est capable de soulever une voiture haut dans le ciel.

en.Y: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

fr.X: Ses ailes sont trop petites pour lui permettre de voler. Quand lévolution approche, il sort lui-même du crâne qui le protège.
fr.Y: Ses ailes sont trop petites pour voler. Il protège son croupion avec un crâne apporté par un Vaututrice.

en.X: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
en.Y: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.

fr.X: Il tournoie dans les airs en quête dune proie sur laquelle il fondra avant de lemporter avec aisance à son nid.
fr.Y: Il guette le sol depuis les airs et fond sur les proies affaiblies. Il aime sapprêter avec des ossements.

en.X: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and consume their insides.
en.Y: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

fr.X: Avec sa langue de feu à haute température, il fait fondre le corps dacier des Fermite pour les dévorer.
fr.Y: Il aspire de lair par la queue et le transforme en une langue de feu qui fait fondre les Fermite dont il se régale.

en.X: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
en.Y: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

fr.X: Ils travaillent de concert pour protéger leur colonie des terribles attaques de leur prédateur naturel, Aflamanoir.
fr.Y: Ils portent une armure de fer et se regroupent pour contrer les attaques de leurs prédateurs, les Aflamanoir.

en.X: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
en.Y: Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

fr.X: Comme il ne voit rien, il perçoit son environnement en mordant et en fonçant à tout va. Il est couvert de plaies.
fr.Y: Comme il ne voit rien, il perçoit son environnement en mordant et en fonçant à tout va.

en.X: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
en.Y: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

fr.X: Ses deux têtes sentendent mal et sont en compétition permanente pour savoir qui mangera le plus et qui sera le chef.
fr.Y: Quand il a mangé tout ce qui traînait sur son territoire, il migre vers dautres horizons. Ses 2 têtes sentendent mal.

abilities.name: Levitate

en.X: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
en.Y: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!

fr.X: Les têtes sur ses bras nont pas de cerveau. Avec ses trois têtes, il dévore et détruit tout.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon effrayant. Ses trois têtes dévorent tout ce qui bouge jusquà satiété.

en.X: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
en.Y: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

fr.X: On dit que ce Pokémon serait né du soleil. Il évolue en enveloppant son corps des flammes qui jaillissent de ses cornes.
fr.Y: Il vit au pied des volcans. Il repousse ceux qui lattaquent avec les flammes qui jaillissent de ses cinq cornes.

en.X: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
en.Y: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

fr.X: Quand il se bat, il fait pleuvoir des écailles enflammées de ses six ailes et transforme les alentours en mer de feu.
fr.Y: On dit que quand le ciel sest obscurci à cause des cendres dun volcan, le feu dun Pyrax aurait remplacé le soleil.

en.X: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
en.Y: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.

fr.X: Il possède un corps et un cur de fer. Il peut mater les Pokémon les plus agressifs dun simple regard.
fr.Y: Un corps et un cur en acier trempé, jadis au service de la défense des Pokémon blessés par les humains.

abilities.name: Justified

en.X: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
en.Y: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.

fr.X: Sa puissance dimpact lui permet denfoncer dun seul coup le rempart dun château. Un Pokémon de légende.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon de légende. Grâce à sa puissance phénoménale, il aurait détruit un château pour sauver des Pokémon.

en.X: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
en.Y: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

fr.X: Ses cornes sont des lames effilées. Il lacère ses ennemis dans un mouvement tourbillonnant.
fr.Y: Il lacère ses ennemis avec une agilité sans égale. La légende raconte quil protège les Pokémon.

en.Y: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

fr.Y: Il vole dans le ciel dUnys et fait tomber des éclairs, provoquant des incendies qui font sa mauvaise réputation.

fr.X: Un Pokémon légendaire assez puissant pour embraser le monde entier. Il soutient les défenseurs de la Réalité.
fr.Y: Quand sa queue sembrase, lénergie thermique dégagée modifie latmosphère et bouleverse la météo du monde entier.

fr.Y: Sa queue produit de lélectricité. Il dissimule son corps dans un nuage électrique et plane dans le ciel dUnys.

en.Y: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

fr.X: Il fait fructifier les cultures partout où il passe, cest pourquoi on lappelle «le dieu des moissons».
fr.Y: Il utilise lénergie quil tire du vent et de la foudre pour enrichir les sols en nutriments pour les cultures.
