en.Y: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

fr.X: Il attend le héros qui saura réanimer son corps de glace incomplet en partageant avec lui son Idéal et sa Réalité.
fr.Y: Son corps produit une énergie à très basse température, mais le souffle glacé quil exhale la gelé lui-même.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.desc: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.desc: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

en.X: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
en.Y: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

fr.X: Il parcourt le monde en courant à la surface des mers et des cours deau. Il apparaît là où leau est très pure.
fr.Y: Lorsquil est résolu, de lénergie sature son corps et le propulse à des vitesses qui dépassent la perception humaine.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

en.X: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
en.Y: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

fr.X: Les mélodies enivrantes de Meloetta touchent les Pokémon, pouvant les rendre heureux ou tristes.
fr.Y: Sa voix si particulière lui permet de chanter des mélodies qui ensorcellent les gens et modifient leurs émotions.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.desc: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

en.X: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
en.Y: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

fr.X: Un Pokémon Insecte des temps anciens modifié par la Team Plasma. Le canon dans son dos a été grandement amélioré.
fr.Y: Un Pokémon existant depuis 300 millions dannées, et modifié par la Team Plasma. Il a maintenant un canon dans le dos.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Bulletproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

en.X: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
en.Y: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

fr.X: Lorsquil rassemble ses forces, les piquants souples qui recouvrent sa tête deviennent si durs et acérés quils pourraient transpercer un rocher.
fr.Y: Sa tête et son dos sont recouverts dune carapace tellement dure que même une collision avec un camion ne lui ferait rien.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Bulletproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

en.X: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
en.Y: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won’t start fights.

fr.X: La carapace qui recouvre son corps le protège des attaques adverses, et ses piquants lui permettent de contre-attaquer.
fr.Y: Il renforce ses membres inférieurs en se ruant violemment sur ses congénères. Naturellement paisible, il ne provoque jamais un combat.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Bulletproof
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

en.X: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
en.Y: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

fr.X: Il est si puissant quil pourrait renverser un char de 50 t dun seul assaut. Il se sert de son corps comme dun bouclier pour protéger ses alliés.
fr.Y: Il se défend en joignant ses poings devant son visage. Dans cette posture, il peut même résister à londe de choc dune explosion.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magician
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

en.X: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
en.Y: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

fr.X: En cas de coup de fatigue, il grignote des rameaux pour recharger ses batteries. Ses oreilles dégagent une chaleur qui dépasse les 200 °C.
fr.Y: Il a toujours une brindille avec lui en cas de petit creux. Il projette de lair chaud par ses oreilles pour intimider ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magician
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

en.X: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
en.Y: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

fr.X: Il allume la branche plantée dans sa queue en la frottant contre son pelage et sen sert au combat.
fr.Y: Quand il saisit la branche plantée dans sa queue, elle prend feu par friction. Il peut communiquer avec ses congénères en agitant ce bâton enflammé.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magician
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

en.X: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
en.Y: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

fr.X: Peut prédire lavenir sil se concentre en fixant la flamme qui danse au bout de sa canne.
fr.Y: Ses pouvoirs psychiques lui permettent de créer des tourbillons de flammes à 3000 °C qui enveloppent et consument ses ennemis.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Protean
hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

en.X: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
en.Y: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

fr.X: Sa poitrine et son dos sécrètent une mousse qui lui permet de subir moins de dégâts en amortissant le choc des attaques.
fr.Y: Il protège son corps en lentourant dune mousse délicate. Malgré son apparence insouciante, ce Pokémon est en fait constamment à laffût.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Protean
hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

en.X: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
en.Y: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

fr.X: Il est capable de lancer des pierres recouvertes de mousse avec une précision suffisante pour toucher une canette vide à 30 m.
fr.Y: Son agilité est incomparable. Il peut gravir une tour de 600 m de haut en moins dune minute.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

hiddenAbilities.name: Protean
hiddenAbilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

en.X: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
en.Y: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

fr.X: Il transforme des jets deau sous pression en redoutables shuriken. Une fois lancés, ils tournent si vite quils peuvent même couper le métal.
fr.Y: Aussi insaisissable quun ninja, il se joue de ses ennemis grâce à sa célérité, et les tranche de ses Sheauriken.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.desc: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

hiddenAbilities.name: Huge Power
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

en.X: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
en.Y: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

fr.X: Ses larges oreilles lui permettent de creuser des terriers. Il est capable de forer sans sarrêter pendant toute une nuit.
fr.Y: Il est doté doreilles ressemblant à des pelles. À force de creuser des galeries, leur puissance est telle quelles peuvent trancher de grosses racines.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.desc: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

hiddenAbilities.name: Huge Power
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

en.X: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
en.Y: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it’s finished digging, it lounges lazily.

fr.X: Ses grandes oreilles sont si musclées quil peut soulever un rocher dune tonne sans broncher. Ce Pokémon est souvent utilisé sur les chantiers.
fr.Y: Ses oreilles sont de véritables excavateurs, venant à bout des blocs de pierre les plus durs. Après leffort, il se repose en paressant.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gale Wings
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

en.X: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
en.Y: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it’s merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

fr.X: Peu farouche, il communique avec ses congénères par un doux gazouillis et par des signaux de la queue.
fr.Y: Son chant est harmonieux, mais trompeur ! Les ennemis qui pénètrent sur son territoire se retrouvent confrontés à un déluge de violence.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gale Wings
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

en.X: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
en.Y: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

fr.X: Il crache des étincelles pour brûler les hautes herbes et attraper les proies surprises qui tentent déchapper à lincendie.
fr.Y: Il possède une poche remplie de feu sur son ventre. Plus elle émet de chaleur, plus il vole vite. Cependant, elle met quelque temps à chauffer.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gale Wings
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

en.X: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
en.Y: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

fr.X: Exalté par un combat sans merci, il senvole en semant dans son sillage les escarbilles du feu qui couve dans son plumage.
fr.Y: Quand il sabat sur ses proies, sa vitesse dépasse les 500 km/h. Il les achève dun puissant coup de serre.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.desc: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

hiddenAbilities.name: Friend Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

en.X: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
en.Y: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

fr.X: Lorsquil est poursuivi par un Pokémon Oiseau, il projette une poudre noire qui paralyse tous ceux quelle touche.
fr.Y: La poudre qui recouvre son corps laide à réguler sa température. Il peut sadapter à tous les climats.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

hiddenAbilities.name: Friend Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

en.X: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
en.Y: The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

fr.X: Vit caché sous le couvert des buissons. Poursuivi par un ennemi, il tente de lintimider en hérissant les poils qui lui couvrent le corps.
fr.Y: Même les becs acérés des Pokémon Oiseaux ne parviennent pas à meurtrir son corps très dur. Il se défend en crachant de la poudre.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.desc: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

hiddenAbilities.name: Friend Guard
hiddenAbilities.desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

en.X: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
en.Y: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

fr.X: Les ailes des Prismillon arborent différents motifs en fonction de leur aire dorigine. Il est possible que le climat y soit pour quelque chose.
fr.Y: Selon le climat de sa région dorigine, les motifs de ses ailes sont différents. Il sème des écailles aux couleurs vives.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

hiddenAbilities.name: Moxie
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

en.X: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
en.Y: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.

fr.X: Plus ladversaire auquel il est confronté est fort, plus la température de sa crinière augmente, lénergie générée se diffusant alors dans tout son corps.
fr.Y: Il nhésite pas à quitter la horde et à mener une existence solitaire pour mieux pouvoir sentraîner. Il a le sang chaud et ne rechigne pas au combat.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

hiddenAbilities.name: Moxie
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

en.X: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
en.Y: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.

fr.X: Le mâle qui possède la crinière de feu la plus imposante devient le chef de la horde.
fr.Y: Son souffle peut atteindre les 6000 °C et il sen sert pour intimider lennemi. Dans la horde, les femelles protègent les petits.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

hiddenAbilities.name: Symbiosis
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

en.X: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.
en.Y: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind’s embrace with an untroubled heart.

fr.X: Capable de libérer et de contrôler la force cachée des plantes. La fleur quil tient fait partie de lui.
fr.Y: Après avoir trouvé une fleur à son goût, il ne la quitte plus de toute sa vie. Il se laisse porter au gré du vent.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

hiddenAbilities.name: Symbiosis
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

en.X: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
en.Y: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

fr.X: Il survole les champs de fleurs, et prend soin de celles qui sont sur le point de faner. Au combat, il fait appel à leur force cachée.
fr.Y: Quand les fleurs dune plate-bande bien soignée éclosent, il apparaît et célèbre la floraison en dansant avec une très grande élégance.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

hiddenAbilities.name: Symbiosis
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

en.X: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
en.Y: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

fr.X: Les jardins fleuris sont son territoire. Il se baigne dans lénergie dégagée par les plantes en fleurs pour labsorber.
fr.Y: Les châtelains de jadis invitaient les Florges sur leurs terres et leur confiaient la réalisation de leurs jardins.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Grass Pelt
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

en.X: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
en.Y: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon paisible serait le premier à avoir jamais cohabité avec les humains.
fr.Y: Tant quil a de leau et du soleil en abondance, ce Pokémon na pas besoin de nourriture. Les feuilles sur son dos produisent son énergie par photosynthèse.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Grass Pelt
hiddenAbilities.desc: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

en.X: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
en.Y: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

fr.X: Quand son Dresseur le tient par une corne, il est capable de deviner ses plus subtils changements dhumeur et de sy adapter.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon vit dans les régions montagneuses. Le chef du troupeau simpose à lissue dun combat de cornes.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
en.Y: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can’t help grinning if anyone pats its head.

fr.X: Il fait son possible pour intimider ses adversaires avec un regard menaçant, mais sans succès. Il a lhabitude de constamment mâcher une feuille.
fr.Y: Il fait de son mieux pour avoir un air patibulaire, mais il sourit béatement dès quon lui caresse la tête.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

hiddenAbilities.name: Scrappy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

en.X: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
en.Y: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

fr.X: Dun tempérament fougueux, il ne supporte pas que lon sen prenne aux faibles. Sa feuille lui permet de deviner les actions de lennemi.
fr.Y: Il encaisse les attaques de plein fouet sans même tiquer et il poursuit sa route. Il étale ses ennemis dun coup de patte capable de briser un poteau électrique.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.desc: Reduces damage from physical moves.

en.X: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
en.Y: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.

fr.X: Si son abondante fourrure gagne à être toilettée, ce nest pas quune question de style. En effet, cela lui permet également de se mouvoir plus librement.
fr.Y: Il y a fort longtemps dans la région de Kalos, ce Pokémon fut le gardien des rois et des reines.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Own Tempo
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

en.X: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
en.Y: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

fr.X: Il couvre la source de ses pouvoirs psychiques hors du commun avec ses oreilles afin déviter les accidents.
fr.Y: Il a quelques difficultés à contrôler son pouvoir psychique. Grâce à celui-ci, il peut projeter en lair tous les objets dans un rayon de 100 m.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

hiddenAbilities.name: Prankster
hiddenAbilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

en.X: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
en.Y: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

fr.X: Sil se sent menacé, il lève les oreilles et déchaîne un pouvoir psychique capable de réduire en miettes un camion de 10 t.
fr.Y: Les motifs en forme dyeux à lintérieur de ses oreilles émettent une force psychique tellement puissante quil est contraint de les garder couverts.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.desc: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

en.X: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
en.Y: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person’s arm and drains that person’s life energy completely.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon naît quand lâme dun défunt prend possession dune épée ancienne. Il saccroche aux humains pour absorber leur énergie vitale.
fr.Y: Si quelquun saventure à lempoigner, il enroule son étoffe bleue autour du bras de linfortuné et aspire son énergie vitale jusquà ce que ce dernier sécroule.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.desc: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

en.X: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
en.Y: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

fr.X: En évoluant, Monorpale se divise en deux épées qui communiquent par télépathie pour mieux découper leur adversaire en morceaux.
fr.Y: Même les sabreurs chevronnés sont incapables de parer les assauts continus et complexes menés de concert par ces deux épées.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.desc: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.desc: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

en.X: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
en.Y: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

fr.X: Ils ont fait le bonheur de générations de rois. Leurs pouvoirs psychiques leur permettent de contrôler hommes et Pokémon.
fr.Y: Il peut déceler les qualités régaliennes dans les âmes humaines. On raconte que celui ou celle qui obtient sa faveur deviendra à coup sûr roi ou reine.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

hiddenAbilities.name: Aroma Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

en.X: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
en.Y: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

fr.X: Son corps dégage un parfum qui envoûte ceux qui le respirent et change en fonction de son alimentation.
fr.Y: Par le passé, les femmes de la noblesse ne se parfumaient pas, mais étaient accompagnées dun Fluvetin exhalant leur parfum favori.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

hiddenAbilities.name: Aroma Veil
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

en.X: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
en.Y: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon est capable démettre toutes sortes dodeurs pour incommoder son adversaire et augmenter ses chances de gagner.
fr.Y: Son parfum est tellement capiteux quun Dresseur nappréciant pas pleinement son odeur aura toutes les difficultés du monde à cheminer à ses côtés.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unburden
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

en.X: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
en.Y: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

fr.X: Il immobilise son adversaire à laide de filaments blancs, sucrés et collants qui ressemblent à de la barbe à papa.
fr.Y: Il se gave de sucreries à longueur de journée, à tel point que sa fourrure finit par ressembler à de la barbe à papa, sucrée et poisseuse.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

hiddenAbilities.name: Unburden
hiddenAbilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

en.X: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
en.Y: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human’s, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It’s like it can see with its nose!

fr.X: La finesse de son odorat lui permet de distinguer les nuances de parfums les plus subtiles, ce qui en fait un compagnon idéal pour les pâtissiers.
fr.Y: Son odorat est des millions de fois plus développé que celui dun humain. Il se repère dans lespace grâce aux odeurs qui flottent autour de lui.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.desc: Negates all moves that force switching out.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
en.Y: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent’s will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

fr.X: Éblouis par les points lumineux qui clignotent sur son corps, les ennemis perdent toute envie de se battre.
fr.Y: Il ébranle le moral des ennemis lui cherchant noise grâce aux clignotements quil émet. Il profite de cette diversion pour se cacher.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.desc: Negates all moves that force switching out.

hiddenAbilities.name: Infiltrator
hiddenAbilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

en.X: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
en.Y: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

fr.X: Doté des pouvoirs hypnotiques les plus puissants du règne des Pokémon, il manipule son adversaire à sa guise.
fr.Y: Il attire ses ennemis en les hypnotisant, avant de les enserrer de ses tentacules et de les neutraliser avec son suc gastrique.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of contact moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Pickpocket
hiddenAbilities.desc: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

en.X: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
en.Y: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

fr.X: Chaque rocher abrite deux Opermine. Sils se disputent, lun dentre eux part à la recherche dun nouveau logis.
fr.Y: Ils prennent de lélan avec tout leur corps et soulèvent ainsi leur pierre pour se déplacer. Ils mangent les algues échouées sur le rivage.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of contact moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Pickpocket
hiddenAbilities.desc: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

en.X: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
en.Y: Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head’s orders.

fr.X: Après évolution, les deux Opermine laissent place à sept créatures qui ont la puissance cumulée de sept Opermine.
fr.Y: Ses jambes et ses bras sont dotés dune volonté propre. Cependant, ils suivent généralement les ordres donnés.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

hiddenAbilities.name: Adaptability
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves of the same type.

en.X: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
en.Y: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

fr.X: Il se cache parmi les algues en décomposition pour mieux approcher ses proies, quil achève en les aspergeant de poison.
fr.Y: Sa ressemblance avec le varech pourri est confondante. Il se soustrait à lattention de ses ennemis en attendant de pouvoir évoluer.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

hiddenAbilities.name: Adaptability
hiddenAbilities.desc: Powers up moves of the same type.

en.X: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
en.Y: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

fr.X: Il asperge tous ceux qui osent pénétrer sur son territoire dun poison assez corrosif pour dissoudre la coque dun pétrolier.
fr.Y: Il paraît que les navires qui saventurent dans les eaux peuplées de Kravarech ne reviennent jamais de leur périple.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

en.X: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
en.Y: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.

fr.X: Sa pince projette un jet deau sous pression suffisamment puissant pour abattre ses proies en plein vol.
fr.Y: Il est capable de transformer son corps en canon à eau, grâce à la combustion dun gaz interne. À bout portant, il peut réduire un rocher en miettes.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

en.X: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
en.Y: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

fr.X: Son énorme pince projette de véritables obus deau capables de transpercer la coque dun pétrolier.
fr.Y: La force de propulsion générée par lexpulsion de leau via la tuyère située à larrière de sa pince peut lui conférer une vitesse de 60 nuds.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Solar Power
hiddenAbilities.desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

en.X: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
en.Y: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon vit dans le désert. Il na pas besoin de se nourrir, car il est capable dabsorber lénergie du soleil.
fr.Y: Les plis de peau de chaque côté de sa tête sont dotés de cellules produisant de lélectricité quand elles sont exposées à la lumière du soleil.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

hiddenAbilities.name: Solar Power
hiddenAbilities.desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

en.X: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
en.Y: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

fr.X: Lélectricité que produit un seul Iguolta en agitant sa collerette suffit à alimenter un immeuble entier.
fr.Y: Il augmente sa puissance motrice en stimulant les muscles de ses pattes avec des décharges électriques. Il peut ainsi parcourir 100 m en 5 s.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of biting moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rock Head
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

en.X: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
en.Y: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

fr.X: Ramené à la vie à partir dun fossile, ce Pokémon très capricieux devient violent à la moindre contrariété.
fr.Y: Ses énormes mâchoires ont tant de puissance quelles peuvent compresser une voiture sans problème. Ce Pokémon vivait il y a 100 millions dannées.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of biting moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Rock Head
hiddenAbilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

en.X: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
en.Y: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

fr.X: Dans les temps anciens, aucun Pokémon ne pouvait rivaliser avec lui. Ses puissantes mâchoires peuvent réduire une épaisse plaque de métal en confettis.
fr.Y: Il y a 100 millions dannées, ce Pokémon régnait en maître absolu. Personne ne pouvait se mesurer à lui.

abilities.name: Refrigerate
abilities.desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Snow Warning
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

en.X: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
en.Y: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

fr.X: Pokémon ancien, ramené à la vie après la découverte dune partie de son corps conservée dans la glace pendant 100 millions dannées.
fr.Y: Ce Pokémon placide vivait dans des contrées au climat froid, loin de la menace dun violent prédateur comme Rexillius.

abilities.name: Refrigerate
abilities.desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

hiddenAbilities.name: Snow Warning
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

en.X: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
en.Y: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent’s attack.

fr.X: Les cristaux qui parsèment son corps lui permettent de piéger ses ennemis dans la glace en émettant de lair refroidi à -150 °C.
fr.Y: En utilisant ses cristaux, il peut créer en un instant un mur de glace pour se protéger des attaques ennemies.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

hiddenAbilities.name: Pixilate
hiddenAbilities.desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

en.X: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
en.Y: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.

fr.X: Pour arrêter le combat, il émet des ondes apaisantes avec ses rubans.
fr.Y: Il enroule ses rubans sensoriels autour du bras de son Dresseur adoré et chemine paisiblement à ses côtés.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

hiddenAbilities.name: Mold Breaker
hiddenAbilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

en.X: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
en.Y: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

fr.X: Malgré sa petite taille, son intelligence lui permet daffronter sans trembler de grands Pokémon tels que les Mackogneur ou les Hariyama.
fr.Y: Il utilise ses ailes pour contrôler avec précision sa posture en vol. Ses attaques aériennes sont difficiles à parer.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.desc: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

hiddenAbilities.name: Plus
hiddenAbilities.desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

en.X: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
en.Y: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

fr.X: Ses moustaches lui servent dantennes, et lui permettent denvoyer et de recevoir des signaux pour communiquer à distance avec ses congénères.
fr.Y: Il utilise sa queue pour pomper lénergie des centrales électriques ou pour se brancher sur les prises des maisons. Ses moustaches envoient des décharges.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sturdy
hiddenAbilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

en.X: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
en.Y: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It’s occasionally found during the excavation of caves.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon vient des profondeurs de la terre, où la chaleur et la pression sont intenses. La pierre qui orne sa tête émet de lénergie.
fr.Y: Il sommeille sous terre depuis son apparition, il y a plusieurs centaines de millions dannées. On le découvre parfois en creusant des cavernes.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gooey
hiddenAbilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

en.X: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.
en.Y: It’s covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

fr.X: Cest le plus faible de tous les Pokémon Dragon. Pour éviter que son corps ne se dessèche, il recherche les lieux humides et ombragés.
fr.Y: Son corps est recouvert dune membrane gluante, aussi les coups des ennemis glissent sur lui sans lui faire le moindre mal.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gooey
hiddenAbilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

en.X: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.
en.Y: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.

fr.X: Il repousse ses ennemis en sécrétant un fluide qui dissout tout ce quil touche. Suite à une dégénérescence de ses yeux, il est aveugle.
fr.Y: Ses quatre cornes constituant un radar extrêmement puissant, il na besoin ni de nez ni doreilles pour percevoir les sons et les odeurs.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Gooey
hiddenAbilities.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

en.X: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
en.Y: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that’s the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon Dragon peu farouche aime faire la fête à son Dresseur adoré, le couvrant au passage de sa bave collante.
fr.Y: Il attaque grâce à ses cornes extensibles. Ses coups sont aussi puissants que ceux de 100 boxeurs professionnels réunis.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.

hiddenAbilities.name: Magician
hiddenAbilities.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

en.X: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
en.Y: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon collectionne les clés quil agite devant ses ennemis pour les intimider.
fr.Y: Comme il ne se sépare jamais dune clé quil trouve à son goût, les gens lui confient celle de leurs coffres, afin déviter de se faire voler.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

hiddenAbilities.name: Harvest
hiddenAbilities.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.

en.X: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
en.Y: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon apparaît lorsquun esprit possède un arbre en décomposition. Il vit dans les forêts où les humains nosent pas saventurer.
fr.Y: Daprès la légende, cette espèce de Pokémon aurait vu le jour quand des âmes denfants perdus dans la forêt auraient possédé des souches darbres.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

hiddenAbilities.name: Harvest
hiddenAbilities.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.

en.X: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
en.Y: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It’s kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

fr.X: Commande aux autres arbres. Il emprisonne jusquà la fin de leurs jours les humains qui abîment la forêt.
fr.Y: Ses racines sont un véritable système nerveux qui lui permet de contrôler les arbres de la forêt. Il se montre très gentil envers les Pokémon vivant dans son écorce.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

en.X: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
en.Y: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon est né du mariage dun esprit piégé dans le monde des vivants et dune citrouille. Il commence à sanimer au coucher du soleil.
fr.Y: Il paraît quil accompagne les âmes des défunts jusque dans lau-delà, pour quelles puissent goûter au repos éternel.

abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

hiddenAbilities.name: Insomnia
hiddenAbilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

en.X: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
en.Y: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

fr.X: Les nuits de nouvelle lune, ce Pokémon erre dans les rues en chantant dune voix lugubre. Ceux qui lentendent sont maudits.
fr.Y: Il enserre ses proies dans ses bras, semblables à de longues mèches de cheveux. Il se délecte de leur souffrance en chantonnant gaiement.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sturdy
hiddenAbilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

en.X: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
en.Y: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

fr.X: La glace qui couvre son corps bloque les attaques ennemies. Si elle se fissure, il la reconstitue immédiatement en soufflant de lair glacé.
fr.Y: Il gèle ses ennemis dune bourrasque à -100 °C. Il vit en troupeau avec ses congénères, dans les neiges éternelles des hautes montagnes.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

hiddenAbilities.name: Sturdy
hiddenAbilities.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

en.X: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
en.Y: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

fr.X: Son immense corps recouvert de glace est aussi solide que de lacier. Quand il se déplace, il écrase tout qui se trouve sur son passage.
fr.Y: Quand on le voit transportant les petits Grelaçon qui vivent sur son dos, il y a une ressemblance certaine avec les véhicules déplaçant les fusées.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
en.Y: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

fr.X: Il apprécie les grottes les plus sombres. Ses grandes oreilles lui permettent de générer des ultrasons dune fréquence de 200000 Hz.
fr.Y: Les ultrasons à 200000 Hz quil émet suffiraient à rendre groggy le plus chevronné des lutteurs.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

hiddenAbilities.name: Telepathy
hiddenAbilities.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

en.X: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
en.Y: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

fr.X: Les nuits sans lune, il quadrille le ciel à la recherche dune proie. Dans lobscurité, aucun Pokémon ne peut rivaliser avec lui.
fr.Y: Il peut littéralement pulvériser de gros rochers grâce aux ultrasons émis par ses oreilles. Il surgit des ténèbres pour attaquer par surprise.

abilities.name: Fairy Aura
abilities.desc: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

en.X: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
en.Y: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

fr.X: On dit que ce Pokémon immortel peut offrir ses forces vitales. Il a été ranimé après avoir passé 1000 ans endormi sous la forme dun arbre.
fr.Y: Daprès la légende, quand ses bois brillent de sept couleurs, cela signifie quil prodigue la vie éternelle.

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.desc: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

en.X: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
en.Y: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

fr.X: Lorsque les plumes de sa queue et de ses ailes sont déployées et virent au rouge, ce Pokémon légendaire absorbe lénergie vitale de ce qui lentoure.
fr.Y: Quand il sent que la fin de sa vie est proche, il aspire la force vitale des êtres vivants et retourne à létat de cocon.

abilities.name: Aura Break
abilities.desc: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.

en.X: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
en.Y: It’s hypothesized that it’s monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.

fr.X: Lorsque lécosystème de Kalos est menacé, ce Pokémon apparaît et utilise son mystérieux pouvoir.
fr.Y: Il paraît quil vit au fond dune grotte, doù il surveillerait les personnes qui détruisent lécosystème.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

en.X: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
en.Y: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

fr.X: Ce Pokémon est une mutation spontanée de Strassie. Son corps rose et luisant est dune beauté incomparable.
fr.Y: Il peut créer une multitude de diamants en un instant en serrant ses mains, simplement en compressant les molécules de carbone contenues dans lair.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

fr.X: Ce fauteur de troubles est doté danneaux qui déforment lespace et lui permettent dexpédier au loin nimporte quel objet.
fr.Y: Il a la faculté de téléporter les choses en les faisant passer au travers de ses anneaux. Il envoie les objets qui lui plaisent dans une cachette connue de lui seul.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

fr.X: Il est capable de générer un nuage de vapeur pour se cacher. Il vit dans des montagnes inhabitées.
fr.Y: Il évacue la vapeur qui saccumule à lintérieur de son corps par les bras situés sur son dos. Ce jet est assez puissant pour raser des montagnes.
